test = {}; -- SCV(공병)은 이미 미션2에서 사용 중이라 여기에 넣으면 안 됨.

table.insert(test, {"군인 - 장교", SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, "Gantrithor (Carrier)")});
table.insert(test, {"군인 - 중화기병", SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)")});
table.insert(test, {"군인 - 의무병", SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Overmind")}); -- / 지원사격
table.insert(test, {"지원사격(변경)", SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker")}); -- / 힐
table.insert(test, {"군용 헬기", SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Larva")}); --5 / 분신술

table.insert(test, {"Terran Valkyrie", SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie")});

Trigger { -- 00. 테스트 트리거 아니고 순서상 위에 두는 거 / 울트라 좀비 지원사격 인식
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "울트라 좀비", AllPlayers, "Anywhere", 20);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Anywhere", 20);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 01-1. 테스트 트리거 순서상 위에 두는 거 / 미션2 가스 보관실 테스트
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	    Switch("Switch 18", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(All, "좀비충", "Location 96", P7);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", P5, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", P5, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", P5, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Zerg Mutalisk", P5, "Location 85", 100);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 지속 적용
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 127", Set);
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "광신도", AllPlayers, "Location 155", 0);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "광신도", AllPlayers, "Location 155", 0);

		KillUnitAt(All, "자폭 좀비", "Location 155", P7);
	}
}

		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 6");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 5");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 4");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 3");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 2");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 1");
	}
}

for i=1,7 do -- 테스트 유닛 생산으로 특정 트리거 실행
Trigger { 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, test[i][1]);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnit(test[i][1], CurrentPlayer);
		test[i][2];
	},
}
end

Trigger { -- 테스트 포스1 시민 주기
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Command(P1, AtLeast, 1, "시민");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P1, "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 테스트용 키인식
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		키인식("R", Exactly);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
	    ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Anywhere", 100);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		키인식("T", Exactly);
		Command(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnit("군인 - 공병", P6);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "군인 - 공병");
	}
}

		Switch("Switch 17", Set);

		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	}

for i=1,5 do -- 테스트 스킬 맞춰주기
Trigger { 
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, i, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, i, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 킬표시 점수표
	players = {AllPlayers},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		LeaderBoardScore(Custom, "\x06KILL");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 진동,폭발형 공격 일반형으로
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemory(0x515BA0, SetTo, 0x00000100);
		SetMemory(0x515BA4, SetTo, 0x00000100);
		SetMemory(0x515BB8, SetTo, 0x00000100);
		SetMemory(0x515BBC, SetTo, 0x00000100);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 깃발 없애기
	players = {P6, P7, P8},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Flag", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("Flag", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Flag", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("Flag", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 선택 비콘에서 6피 시민 무적&고정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 42");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "시민", P6, "Location 42");
		Order("시민", P6, "Location 42", Move, "Location 42");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 아래 스킬 쿨타임 메시지 마린 나오면 다시 보여주게 하기
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 동맹 설정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetAllianceStatus(Force1, AlliedVictory);
		SetAllianceStatus(P6, Ally);
		SetAllianceStatus(P7, Enemy);
		SetAllianceStatus(P12, Enemy);
	},
}

		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 3");

Trigger { -- 킬수 표시
	players = {P6, P7},
	conditions = {
		Score(CurrentPlayer, KillsAndRazings, AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, Custom);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, KillsAndRazings);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		Score(CurrentPlayer, KillsAndRazings, AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, Custom);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, KillsAndRazings);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Score(CurrentPlayer, KillsAndRazings, AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Army critical stop.wav");
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, Custom);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, KillsAndRazings);
	},
}

die = {};

table.insert(die, {P1, "군인 - 소총병", "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)", "\x13\x08플레이어 1 사망\r\n\r\n"});

table.insert(die, {P6, "권인빈 상사", "Psi Disrupter", "\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===============\r\n\x13\x06권인빈 상사 사망\r\n\x13\x07===============\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n"}); --9

for i=1,9 do -- 플레이어&NPC 사망
Trigger {
	players = {die[i][1]},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, die[i][2]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, die[i][3]);	
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, die[i][2]);
	}
}

Trigger { 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, die[i][3]);
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, die[i][3]);
		DisplayText(die[i][4], 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\airraid.wav");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}
end

Trigger { -- 6~12 마나0 / 플레이어 일부 마나0
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "군인 - 장교", AllPlayers, "Anywhere", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "좀비", AllPlayers, "Anywhere", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "좀비", P9, "Anywhere", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "좀비", P10, "Anywhere", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "좀비", P11, "Anywhere", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "좀비", P12, "Anywhere", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "플라잉 좀비충", AllPlayers, "Anywhere", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 04. 스킬 관련 준비 트리거 ( 테스트 포함 ) / 스킬 쿨타임 처음 적용
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1071, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}

skillkill = {1, 40, 170, 520, 550};

skillget = {};

table.insert(skillget, {133, "Zerg Overmind", "지원사격"});
table.insert(skillget, {327, "Easy Mode", "마인드 컨트롤"});
table.insert(skillget, {216, "Zerg Lurker Egg", "회피"});
table.insert(skillget, {1071, "Zerg Lurker", "Heal"});
table.insert(skillget, {1189, "Zerg Larva", "분신술"});

for i=1,5 do -- 스킬 획득 + 메시지(테스트 포함)
Trigger {
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Score(CurrentPlayer, Custom, AtLeast, skillkill[i]);
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, i, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, skillget[i][1], skillget[i][2]);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x05"..skillkill[i].." Kill\x17\x17\r\n\r\n\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ "..skillget[i][3].." ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 0);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 테스트 스킬 맞춰주기
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, i, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, i, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	}
}
end

testu1 = {};

table.insert(testu1, {"Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "군인 - 소총병", "군인 - 소총병"});
table.insert(testu1, {"Magellan (Science Vessel)", "군인 - 소총병", "군인 - 소총병"});
table.insert(testu1, {"Dark Templar (Hero)", "군인 - 소총병", "군인 - 소총병"});
table.insert(testu1, {"Zerg Mutalisk", "군인 - 소총병", "군인 - 소총병"});
table.insert(testu1, {"Protoss High Templar", "군인 - 소총병", "군인 - 소총병"}); -- 5 / 맨 앞의 하템은 더미 유닛
table.insert(testu1, {Set, Cleared, Set});
table.insert(testu1, {P5, CurrentPlayer, CurrentPlayer});

testskill = {"Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Dark Templar (Hero)", "Zerg Mutalisk", "군인 - 소총병"};

for i=1,5 do -- 스킬 쿨타임 1씩 줄어듦 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,3 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 1, "Zerg Extractor");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Easy Mode");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "Easy Mode");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 4, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
	},
}

Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end

for i=1,5 do --마린한테 로케이션 이동 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..i, testu1[i][m], testu1[7][m], "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+5, testu1[i][m], testu1[7][m], "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+20, testu1[i][m], testu1[7][m], "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+25, testu1[i][m], testu1[7][m], "Anywhere");	
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+65, testu1[i][m], testu1[7][m], "Anywhere");
	},
}
end
end

Trigger { -- 05-1. 지원사격 스킬
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zerg Extractor");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 4, "Zerg Extractor");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
	}
}

ultrashoot = {};

table.insert(ultrashoot, {P7, "울트라 좀비"});
table.insert(ultrashoot, {P9, "울트라 좀비"});

mi5shoot = {};

table.insert(mi5shoot, {P7, P9, Force1});

for i=1,5 do -- 울트라 지원사격 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,2 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger {
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Bring(ultrashoot[m][1], AtLeast, 1, ultrashoot[m][2], "Location "..i+5);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(Force1, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+15, ultrashoot[m][2], ultrashoot[m][1], "Location "..i+5);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 332, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i+15, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill1.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - 지원사격", 4);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(1, "울트라 좀비", ultrashoot[m][1], "Location "..i+15, 50);
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end
end

Trigger { -- 지원사격 오류 방지
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 48, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 48, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		SetDeaths(P6, Subtract, 1, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	},
}

for i=1,5 do -- 미션5 보스 지원사격 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,3 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger {
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Bring(mi5shoot[1][m], AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location "..25+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(Force1, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+15, "바이러스 가디언", mi5shoot[1][m], "Location "..25+i);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 332, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i+15, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill1.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - 지원사격", 4);
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 100, "Duke Turret2");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end
end

normalshoot = {};

table.insert(normalshoot, {P7, "좀비충", 5});
table.insert(normalshoot, {P7, "개좀비", 5});
table.insert(normalshoot, {P7, "좀비", 5});
table.insert(normalshoot, {P7, "플라잉 좀비", 5});
table.insert(normalshoot, {P7, "독좀비", 25});

for i=1,5 do -- 일반 좀비 지원사격 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,5 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Bring(normalshoot[m][1], AtLeast, 1, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		Bring(P10, Exactly, 0, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		Bring(P11, Exactly, 0, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(Force1, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, normalshoot[m][2], normalshoot[m][1], "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i, 6+i);
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+15, normalshoot[m][2], 6+i, "Location "..normalshoot[m][3]+i);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 332, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i+15, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
        KillUnitAt(1, normalshoot[m][2], "Location "..i+15, 6+i);		
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill1.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - 지원사격", 0);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, Custom);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end
end

mind = {};

table.insert(mind, {P7, "폭탄을 든 좀비", -1, 974, P9, Force1, "Zerg Cerebrate"});
table.insert(mind, {P8, "폭탄을 든 좀비", -1, 974, P10, Force1, "Zerg Cerebrate"});
table.insert(mind, {P12, "폭탄을 든 좀비", -1, 974, P11, Force1, "Zerg Cerebrate"}); --3

table.insert(mind, {P7, "울트라 좀비", -1, 975, P9, CurrentPlayer, "Xel'Naga Temple"}); --4

table.insert(mind, {P7, "자폭 좀비", 6, 973, CurrentPlayer, CurrentPlayer, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"});
table.insert(mind, {P7, "좀비충", 6, 973, CurrentPlayer, CurrentPlayer, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"});
table.insert(mind, {P7, "개좀비", 6, 973, CurrentPlayer, CurrentPlayer, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"});
table.insert(mind, {P7, "좀비", 6, 973, CurrentPlayer, CurrentPlayer, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"});
table.insert(mind, {P7, "독좀비", 6, 974, CurrentPlayer, CurrentPlayer, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"}); -- 9

table.insert(mind, {P7, "바이러스 가디언", -1, 975, P9, CurrentPlayer, "Ion Cannon"}); -- 10

mind2 = {"Zerg Hydralisk Den", "Zerg Extractor", "Zerg Evolution Chamber", "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth", "Zerg Cerebrate"};

for i=1,5 do -- 05-2. 마컨 스킬 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,10 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Bring(mind[m][1], AtLeast, 1, mind[m][2], "Location "..i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Easy Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 999, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Darchon\\mind.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Darchon\\mind.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Darchon\\mind.wav");
		GiveUnits(1, mind[m][2], mind[m][1], "Location "..i, mind[m][3]+i);
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, mind[m][2], mind[m][3]+i, "Location "..i);	
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, mind[m][4], 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..10+i, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		GiveUnits(1, mind[m][2], mind[m][3]+i, "Location "..i, mind[m][5]);
		Order(mind[m][2], mind[m][5], "Location "..10+i, Move, "Location "..10+i);
		SetDeaths(mind[m][6], SetTo, 2, mind[m][7]);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03마인드 컨트롤", 0);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 8, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 15, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 8, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 8, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end
end

Trigger { -- 드론 마컨 메시지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zerg Cerebrate");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Zerg Cerebrate");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 14, "Zerg Cerebrate");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\x13\x03마인드 컨트롤된 바이러스 폭탄이 무력화됐습니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\ZDrHit00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\ZDrHit00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\ZDrHit00.wav");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 마컨 로케 이동용 러커 생산
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Lurker", "Location 45");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Lurker", "Location 45");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Lurker", "Location 45", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Lurker", P7, "Location 45", P9);
	},   
}

for i=1,5 do -- 울트라 마컨 처리
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "울트라 좀비", "Location "..10+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("울트라 좀비", P9, "Location "..10+i, Move, "Location "..10+i);
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location "..10+i);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "울트라 좀비", "Location "..10+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 28, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 107, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..10+i, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\x13\x03울트라 좀비가 마인드 컨트롤에서 벗어났습니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		GiveUnits(1, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location "..10+i, P7);
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location "..10+i, Attack, "Location "..i);
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, "Zerg Lurker", P9, "Location 45");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Location "..10+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, "Zerg Lurker", P9, "Location 45");
	},
}
end

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "울트라 좀비", "Anywhere");

	},
	actions = {

		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Stasis Cell/Prison");
	},
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Anywhere");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Stasis Cell/Prison");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();

	},

for i=1,5 do --
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "울트라 좀비", "Anywhere");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Location 11");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Location 12");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Location 13");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Location 14");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "울트라 좀비", "Location 15");
		Command(i-1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 60, "Stasis Cell/Prison");
		Deaths(Force1, Exactly, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Stasis Cell/Prison");
		MoveLocation("Location 184", "울트라 좀비", P9, "Anywhere");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 107, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 184", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 184", P7);
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 184", Attack, "Location "..i);
	},
}
end

for i=1,5 do -- 일반 유닛 마컨 처리 (테스트 포함)
for m=5,9 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth");
		Bring(mind[m][5], AtLeast, 1, mind[m][2], "Location "..10+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, mind[m][2], mind[m][5], "Location "..10+i);
		Order(mind[m][2], mind[m][5], "Location "..10+i, Move, "Location "..10+i);
		MoveUnit(1, mind[m][2], mind[m][5], "Location "..10+i, "Location "..10+i);
	},
}

Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 10, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, "Zerg Lurker", P9, "Location 45");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 테스트
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 10, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..10+i, "Zerg Lurker", P9, "Location 45");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth");
		GiveUnits(All, "Men", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", P5);
	},
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(6+i, AtLeast, 1, mind[m][2], "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, mind2[i]);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(6+i, AtLeast, 1, mind[m][2], "Anywhere");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 20, mind2[i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mind2[i]);
		KillUnit(mind[m][2], 6+i);
	}
}
end
end

	},
	actions = {

	}

		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");

	},

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 10, "Ion Cannon");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 600, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret1");
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 100, "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},

for i=1,5 do -- 보스 마컨
for m=1,2 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Deaths(i-1, Exactly, mi5mindcol[6][m], "Ion Cannon");
		Deaths(P7, mi5mindcol[7][m], mi5mindcol[8][m], "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 225", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Deaths(i-1, Exactly, mi5mindcol[6][m], "Ion Cannon");
		Deaths(P7, mi5mindcol[7][m], mi5mindcol[8][m], "Xel'Naga Temple");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText(mi5mindcol[i][1], 0);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret1");
	},
}
end
end

table.insert(runmi5, {P10, "역병"}); 
table.insert(runmi5, {P11, "역병"});
table.insert(runmi5, {P12, "역병"}); --6
table.insert(runmi5, {P7, "Left Upper Level Door"}); -- 7

table.insert(runmi5, {P7, "플라잉 좀비"}); -- 2-1 뮤탈

run2mi5 = {};

table.insert(run2mi5, {26,6,6,6,6,6,6,6}); 
table.insert(run2mi5, {27,7,7,7,7,7,7,7}); 
table.insert(run2mi5, {28,8,8,8,8,8,8,8}); 
table.insert(run2mi5, {29,9,9,9,9,9,9,9}); 
table.insert(run2mi5, {30,10,10,10,10,10,10,10}); 

run2mi53 = {};

table.insert(run2mi53, {2085,3047,4047,5102,6059}); 
table.insert(run2mi53, {2049,3040,4040,5045,6052}); 

run2mi54 = {};

table.insert(run2mi54, {AtMost,Exactly}); 
table.insert(run2mi54, {4,5}); 
table.insert(run2mi54, {216,500}); 

run2mi55 = {};

table.insert(run2mi55, {P9,Force1}); 

for i=1,5 do -- 05-3. 회피 스킬 (미션1~4) (테스트 포함)
for m=1,8 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Bring(run[m][1], AtLeast, 1, run[m][2], "Location "..run2[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill3.WAV");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 213, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03회피", 0);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, testu1[i][a], testu1[7][a], "Anywhere");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end
end

for i=1,5 do -- 회피 스킬 (미션5)(직접 유닛에 반응하는 회피) (테스트 포함)
for m=1,8 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Bring(runmi5[m][1], AtLeast, 1, runmi5[m][2], "Location "..run2mi5[i][m]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill3.WAV");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 213, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03회피", 0);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, testu1[i][a], testu1[7][a], "Anywhere");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end
end

		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);

for i=1,5 do -- 회피 스킬 (미션5 / 1-2~5 패턴) (테스트 포함)
for m=1,5 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);

		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, run2mi53[2][m], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");

	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill3.WAV");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 213, 0xFFFF);

		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end
end

for i=1,5 do -- 회피 스킬 (미션5 / 2-1 마컨 패턴) (테스트 포함)
for m=1,3 do

	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);

	},

		PreserveTrigger();

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
}
end

for i=1,5 do -- -- 회피 스킬 처리 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,2 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger { 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, run2mi54[1][m], run2mi54[2][m], "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 198, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, run2mi54[3][m], "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		MoveUnit(1, "저그비콘사용", i+6, "Anywhere", "Location "..i);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, testu1[i][a], testu1[7][a], "Anywhere");
	},
}
end
end
end

for i=1,5 do --
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 50, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Bring(i+6, Exactly, 0, "저그비콘사용", "Location 31");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "저그비콘사용", i+6, "Anywhere", "Location 31");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(i-1, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Anywhere");
		Bring(P5, Exactly, 0, testskill[i], "Anywhere");
		Bring(i+6, Exactly, 0, "저그비콘사용", "Location 31");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "저그비콘사용", i+6, "Anywhere", "Location 31");
	},
}

Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 136, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, testskill[i], P5, "Anywhere");
	},
}
end

Trigger { -- 회피 이펙트 미리 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(5, "저그비콘사용", "Location 31", P8);
		GiveUnits(1, "저그비콘사용", P8, "Location 31", P9);
		GiveUnits(1, "저그비콘사용", P8, "Location 31", P10);
		GiveUnits(1, "저그비콘사용", P8, "Location 31", P11);
		GiveUnits(1, "저그비콘사용", P8, "Location 31", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "저그비콘사용", P8, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "저그비콘사용", P9, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "저그비콘사용", P10, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "저그비콘사용", P11, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "저그비콘사용", P12, "Anywhere");
	},
}

for i=1,5 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 5);
		Bring(6+i, Exactly, 0, "저그비콘사용", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "저그비콘사용", "Location 31", P8);
		GiveUnits(1, "저그비콘사용", P8, "Location 31", 6+i);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 5);
		Bring(6+i, AtLeast, 2, "저그비콘사용", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "저그비콘사용", "Anywhere", 6+i);
	},
}
end

healmi = {};

table.insert(healmi, {AtMost,Exactly}); 
table.insert(healmi, {1071,900}); 

for i=1,5 do -- 05-4. 힐 스킬 (테스트 포함)
for m=1,2 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger {
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, healmi[1][m], 3+m, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill4.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill4.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill4.ogg");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03Heal", 0);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, testu1[i][a], testu1[7][a], "Anywhere", 100);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, healmi[2][m], "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}
end
end
end

for i=1,5 do 
Trigger {
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, testskill[i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	}
}
end

bunsin = {};

table.insert(bunsin, {AtMost, Exactly, Exactly, Exactly});
table.insert(bunsin, {4, 5, 5, 5});
table.insert(bunsin, {P7, P7, P9, Force1});
table.insert(bunsin, {"Men", "바이러스 가디언", "바이러스 가디언", "바이러스 가디언"}); 

for i=1,5 do -- 05-5. 분신 스킬 / 미션 (1~4) (테스트 포함) (테스트 수정 중)
for m=1,4 do
for a=1,3 do
Trigger {
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, bunsin[1][m], bunsin[2][m], "Zerg Larva");
		Command(testu1[7][a], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][a]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(bunsin[3][m], AtLeast, 1, bunsin[4][m], "Location "..i+25);
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][a]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\TEMPLAR\\PTeHal00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\TEMPLAR\\PTeHal00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\TEMPLAR\\PTeHal00.WAV");
		CreateUnit(1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location "..i+5, CurrentPlayer);
		CreateUnit(1, "분신 [2단계]", "Location "..i+5, CurrentPlayer);
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+45, "분신 [1단계]", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation("Location "..i+50, "분신 [2단계]", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 545, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i+45, CurrentPlayer);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 545, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..i+50, CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("분신 [1단계]", CurrentPlayer);
		RemoveUnit("분신 [2단계]", CurrentPlayer);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03분신술", 0);
	},
}
end
end
end

Trigger { -- 공통 분신 처리 (오류 방지)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Ragnasaur (Ash World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Ragnasaur (Ash World)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 220, "Ragnasaur (Ash World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Ragnasaur (Ash World)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Arcturus Mengsk (Battlecruiser)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Alan Turret");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 06-1. 게임 시작 비콘 / 초반 비콘 생성 및 안내 메시지 시작 테스트용 구분
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(1, "시민", "Location 42", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "시민", P7, "Location 42");
		CreateUnit(1, "Easy Mode", "Location 32-1", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "Terran Marker", "Location 32-2", P7); -- 노말모드
		CreateUnit(1, "Protoss Marker", "Location 32-3", P7); -- 하드모드
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-1", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-2", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-3", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 테스트
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 3);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		Switch("Switch 115", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\x13\x08좀비 플래닛 \x172\r\n\r\n\x13\x17By \x16- \x16AntMouse\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		Wait(25);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(25);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 아군이 전멸해도 패배하지 않고, 게임에서 나가지만 않으면 게임 내에서 무한 리트가 됩니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 아군이 전멸해도 패배하지 않고, 게임에서 나가지만 않으면 게임 내에서 무한 리트가 됩니다\r\n\x13\x042. 1탄을 수정6으로 수정하면서 이지 모드, 노말 모드, 난이도 재선택 기능을 추가했습니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3);
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P7, "Location 42", CurrentPlayer);
		Wait(2);
		CenterView("Location 42");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 3);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
		Switch("Switch 115", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\x13\x08좀비 플래닛 \x172\r\n\r\n\x13\x17By \x16- \x16AntMouse\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 아군이 전멸해도 패배하지 않고, 게임에서 나가지만 않으면 게임 내에서 무한 리트가 됩니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 아군이 전멸해도 패배하지 않고, 게임에서 나가지만 않으면 게임 내에서 무한 리트가 됩니다\r\n\x13\x042. 1탄을 수정6으로 수정하면서 이지 모드, 노말 모드, 난이도 재선택 기능을 추가했습니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P7, "Location 42", CurrentPlayer);
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 42");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 방장 없을 때 패배
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 3);
		Switch("Switch 115", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03테스트 버전은 플레이할 수 없습니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(2000);
		Defeat();
	},
}

mode = {"Easy Mode", "Normal Mode", "Hard Mode"};

for i=1,3 do -- 난이도 선택, 스탯 조정 ( 난이도 선택 가능 )
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 32-"..i);
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, mode[i], "Location 32-"..i);
		Switch("Switch 128", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Location 32-"..i, "Location 42");
		RemoveUnit("Easy Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Normal Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Hard Mode", P12);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 난이도 선택, 스탯 조정 ( 하드 모드 고정 )
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 32-"..i);
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, mode[i], "Location 32-"..i);
		Switch("Switch 128", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Location 32-"..i, "Location 42");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F테스트 버전에선 하드 모드만 가능합니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 난이도 선택, 스탯 조정 ( 하드 모드 고정 )
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 32-3");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Hard Mode", "Location 32-3");
		Switch("Switch 128", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Location 32-3", "Location 42");
		RemoveUnit("Easy Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Normal Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Hard Mode", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 비콘 생성 대기 (1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 4, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 5, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 비콘 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6");
		Switch("Switch 27", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 7, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 1부터", "Location 32-1", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 2부터", "Location 32-2", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 3부터", "Location 32-3", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 4부터", "Location 32-4", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 5부터", "Location 32-5", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6", P7);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-1", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-2", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-3", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-4", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-5", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-6", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 1부터", P12, "Location 32-1");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 2부터", P12, "Location 32-2");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 3부터", P12, "Location 32-3");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 4부터", P12, "Location 32-4");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 5부터", P12, "Location 32-5");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "난이도 다시 선택", P12, "Location 32-6");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Easy Mode"); -- 미션1 빨리 세팅하는 거 미리 해두기 인식
		SetSwitch("Switch 27", Set);
	}
}

for i =1,5 do -- 미션 비콘 최초 선택
Trigger {
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 7, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 32-"..i);
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "미션 "..i.."부터", "Location 32-"..i);
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnit("시민", CurrentPlayer);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션 비콘 생성 (반복)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6");
		Switch("Switch 27", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
        SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 7, "Zerg Spawning Pool");		
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 1부터", "Location 32-1", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 2부터", "Location 32-2", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 3부터", "Location 32-3", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 4부터", "Location 32-4", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 5부터", "Location 32-5", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6", P7);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-1", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-2", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-3", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-4", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-5", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Any unit", P7, "Location 32-6", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 1부터", P12, "Location 32-1");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 2부터", P12, "Location 32-2");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 3부터", P12, "Location 32-3");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 4부터", P12, "Location 32-4");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "미션 5부터", P12, "Location 32-5");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "난이도 다시 선택", P12, "Location 32-6");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 난이도 다시 선택 (1)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 7, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 32-6");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Location 32-6", "Location 42");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미션 1부터", "Location 32-1", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미션 2부터", "Location 32-2", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미션 3부터", "Location 32-3", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미션 4부터", "Location 32-4", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미션 5부터", "Location 32-5", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "난이도 다시 선택", "Location 32-6", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 비콘 생성 대기 (2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 101, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 난이도 다시 선택 (2)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 102, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 103, "Zerg Spawning Pool");
		CreateUnit(1, "Easy Mode", "Location 32-1", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "Normal Mode", "Location 32-2", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "Hard Mode", "Location 32-3", P7);
		GiveUnits(all, "Easy Mode", P7, "Location 32-1", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Normal Mode", P7, "Location 32-2", P12);
		GiveUnits(all, "Hard Mode", P7, "Location 32-3", P12);	
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Easy Mode", P12, "Location 32-1");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Normal Mode", P12, "Location 32-2");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Hard Mode", P12, "Location 32-3");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 06-2. 미션2부터 선택 후 스킬 주기+이전 미션 유닛 없애기
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 120, Custom);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\x13\x03모든 플레이어의 킬이 120으로 조정되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 120, Custom);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\x13\x03모든 플레이어의 킬이 120으로 조정되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션3부터
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 170, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 350, Custom);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\x13\x03모든 플레이어의 킬이 350으로 조정되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Right Pit Door");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 170, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 350, Custom);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\x13\x03모든 플레이어의 킬이 350으로 조정되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Right Pit Door");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4부터
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 170, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 500, Custom);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\x13\x03모든 플레이어의 킬이 500으로 조정되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 170, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 500, Custom);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\x13\x03모든 플레이어의 킬이 500으로 조정되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5부터
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 170, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 520, Custom);
		Wait(3);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 550, Custom);
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers); --미션1-1지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers); --미션1-2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers); --미션2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", AllPlayers); --미션3-1지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", AllPlayers); --미션3-2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", AllPlayers); --미션4-1지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", AllPlayers); --미션4-2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 40, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 170, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 520, Custom);
		Wait(3000);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 550, Custom);
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers); --미션1-1지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers); --미션1-2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers); --미션2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", AllPlayers); --미션3-1지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", AllPlayers); --미션3-2지역

		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", AllPlayers); --미션4-1지역

		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", AllPlayers); --미션4-2지역
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 220", P9);
	}

Trigger { -- 미션 선택 전 미션 오브젝트
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		SetMissionObjectives("\x13\x06스킬 목록은 미션을 선택하면 나옵니다.");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 오브젝트 스킬 획득 킬수 알려주기
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMissionObjectives("\x13\x06- 스킬 목록 -\r\n\x13\x07* 모든 스킬은 근처에 적이 있을 때 자동으로 나감 *\r\n\x061킬 \x02    : 지원사격 [ 근처 적 공격, 단 특수 좀비에겐 안 통함 ]\r\n\x0640킬 \x02  : 마인드 컨트롤 [ 근처의 적 지상 유닛을 뺏음 ]\r\n\x06170킬 \x02: 회피 [ 3초간 무적+특수 좀비 무시+지상 유닛 통과 ]\r\n\x06520킬 \x02: Heal [ HP 300 이하일 때 HP 풀회복 ]\r\n\x06550킬 \x02: 분신술 [ 18초 동안 유지되는 마린 2개 생성 ]");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공병한테 따라가는 로케
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Command(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 59", "군인 - 공병", P6, "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation("Location 60", "군인 - 공병", P6, "Anywhere");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 07-1. 미션 1 시작 / 공병 퀸 감지 소리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Command(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 60");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Terran Nuclear Silo");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 60");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Nuclear Silo");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Terran Nuclear Silo");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 60");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Terran Nuclear Silo");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Queen\\ZQuYes02.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Queen\\ZQuYes02.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Queen\\ZQuYes02.WAV");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 24, "Terran Nuclear Silo");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Terran Nuclear Silo");
	}
}

testu2 = {};

table.insert(testu2, {17, 17, 18});
table.insert(testu2, {Set, Cleared, Cleared});

for i=1,5 do -- 미션 공통 플레이어 퀸 처리
for m=1,3 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(testu1[7][m], AtLeast, 1, testu1[i][m]);
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location "..65+i);
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location "..65+i);
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location "..65+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 17", testu1[6][m]);
		Switch("Switch "..testu2[1][m], testu2[2][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, Add, 100, "Terran Control Tower");
		GiveUnits(1, "플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location "..65+i, CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnitAt(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location "..65+i, CurrentPlayer);
		CreateUnit(8, "좀비충", "Location "..25+i, P7);
		Order("좀비충", P7, "Location "..25+i, Patrol, "Location "..25+i);
	}
}
end
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Command(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 59");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 59");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 59");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, Add, 100, "Terran Control Tower");
		GiveUnits(1, "플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 59", P6);
		KillUnitAt(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 59", P6);
		CreateUnit(8, "좀비충", "Location 60", P7);
		Order("좀비충", P7, "Location 60", Patrol, "Location 60");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 100, "Terran Control Tower");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\BROODLING\\ZBrDth00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\BROODLING\\ZBrDth00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\BROODLING\\ZBrDth00.WAV");
	}
}

m1junbi = {}; -- 미션1 처음 1번만 하는 세팅(유닛 아래에 버러우 유닛 깔아 놓기)

table.insert(m1junbi, {"자동로봇", "카메라"});
table.insert(m1junbi, {"군인 - 공병", "카메라"});
table.insert(m1junbi, {"바이러스 에그", "카메라"});
table.insert(m1junbi, {"바이러스 크립", "카메라"});

m1junbi22 = {}; -- 미션1 골럇 피통 총괄

table.insert(m1junbi22, {80});

for i=1,4 do
Trigger {
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, m1junbi[i][1], "Location 43");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i, "Easy Mode");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 44", m1junbi[i][1], P12, "Location 43");
	}
}

Trigger {
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, m1junbi[i][1], "Location 43");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, m1junbi[i][1], "Location 44");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i, "Easy Mode");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, m1junbi[i][1], "Location 44", P12);
		CreateUnit(1, m1junbi[i][1], "Location 44", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, m1junbi[i][1], P7, "Location 44");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, m1junbi[i][2], "Location 44", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    GiveUnits(1, m1junbi[i][2], P7, "Location 44", 7+i);
	}
}

Trigger {
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, m1junbi[i][1], "Location 43");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i, "Easy Mode");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 4, "Easy Mode");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Easy Mode");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션1 초반 마린 움직임 막기
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 1", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 57", "Location 56");
		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 58", "Location 58");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 최초 대화 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(all, "자동로봇", P7, "Location 43", P6);
		GiveUnits(all, "군인 - 공병", P7, "Location 43", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", P6, "Location 43");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "자동로봇", P6, "Location 43", m1junbi22[1][1]); -- 미션1 수정목록
		Wait(3000);
		CenterView("Location 57");
		Wait(1);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F동굴로 대피한지 1시간 후\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		Wait(25);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F자동 로봇으로 동굴 입구를 무너트리고 좀비를 따돌리는데 성공했다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		Wait(4);
		CenterView("Location 56");
		SetSwitch("Switch 1", Set);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie");
		Wait(25);
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 57", Move, "Location 57");
		Wait(3);
		CenterView("Location 57");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F얘네도 거의 맛탱이가 갔네.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F멀쩡한 거 아니야? 부서진 곳도 없는 것 같은데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F다리 쪽이 완전 박살났어. 이정도면 못 움직인다고 봐야지.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F지금은 여기서 나갈 생각부터 하자. 여기 작계는 내가 좀 알거든.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		SetSwitch("Switch 2", Set);
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4250);
		Wait(425);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 내가 알기로 여기가 곧 폐쇄된다는 탄광일거야.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F입구도 막았고 당분간은 안전하겠지. 탄광 끝에 다른 출구가 있다고 하니까 더 들어가 보자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(all, "자동로봇", P7, "Location 43", P6);
		GiveUnits(all, "군인 - 공병", P7, "Location 43", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", P6, "Location 43");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "자동로봇", P6, "Location 43", m1junbi22[1][1]); -- 미션1 수정목록
		Wait(3000);
		CenterView("Location 57");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F동굴로 대피한지 1시간 후\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F자동 로봇으로 동굴 입구를 무너트리고 좀비를 따돌리는데 성공했다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		Wait(4000);
		CenterView("Location 56");
		SetSwitch("Switch 1", Set);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie");
		Wait(2500);
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 57", Move, "Location 57");
		Wait(3000);
		CenterView("Location 57");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F얘네도 거의 맛탱이가 갔네.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F멀쩡한 거 아니야? 부서진 곳도 없는 것 같은데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F다리 쪽이 완전 박살났어. 이정도면 못 움직인다고 봐야지.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F지금은 여기서 나갈 생각부터 하자. 여기 작계는 내가 좀 알거든.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		SetSwitch("Switch 2", Set);
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4250);
		Wait(4250);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 내가 알기로 여기가 곧 폐쇄된다는 탄광일거야.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F입구도 막았고 당분간은 안전하겠지. 탄광 끝에 다른 출구가 있다고 하니까 더 들어가 보자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1초반 탄광소리
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 2", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Terran Supply Depot");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 2", Set);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 30, "Terran Supply Depot");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\missionb.wav");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Terran Supply Depot");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 공병 로케 58까지가는 거 시선 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 58");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 43", Move, "Location 58");
		CenterView("Location 59");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 좀비 발견 후 공병 대화, 이후 좀비 습격 메시지 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 58");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 2", Clear);
		Wait(15);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 58");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 1500);
		CenterView("Location 73");
		Wait(15);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐야…이건…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 58");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 2000);
		Wait(2);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyPss00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("독좀비", 1500);
		Wait(15);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyPss00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("독좀비", 1500);
		Wait(15);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F…!! 야 뒤에!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 57");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 1500);
		CenterView("Location 61");
		Wait(15);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		CenterView("Location 61");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyYes00.WAV");
	},
}

	},

Trigger { -- 히드라 버러우 공격 처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 61", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 200, "Vulture Spider Mine");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2, "Vulture Spider Mine");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 61", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(8, "독좀비", "Location 61", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 43", Patrol, "Location 60");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 36, "Vulture Spider Mine");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 61", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 38, "Vulture Spider Mine");
	},
	actions = {
		KillUnitAt(All, "독좀비", "Location 43", P7);
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 36, "Vulture Spider Mine");

	actions = {

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\M240b.wav");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\M240b.wav");
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\M240b.wav");
