Trigger { -- 히드라 처리 후 다음 대화 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 63, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F씨발……땅 파서 쫓아오는 건 생각 못했는데…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 24");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyPss00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("독좀비", 1500);
		Wait(15);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyPss00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("독좀비", 1500);
		Wait(15);
		CenterView("Location 58");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야 이……시간 없어! 뒤는 로봇이 막게 하고 우린 빨리 튀자!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 58");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4500);
		Wait(45);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3, "Zerg Lurker");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 63, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F씨발……땅 파서 쫓아오는 건 생각 못했는데…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 24");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyPss00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("독좀비", 1500);
		Wait(1500);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Hydra\\ZHyPss00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("독좀비", 1500);
		Wait(1500);
		CenterView("Location 58");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야 이……시간 없어! 뒤는 로봇이 막게 하고 우린 빨리 튀자!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 58");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4500);
		Wait(4500);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3, "Zerg Lurker");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 시작 메시지+일시적으로 폭발형 공격 대형에게 피해 감소
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Lurker");
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 1 :: \x1F동굴 탈출 (1)\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		CenterView("Location 58");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=====================================\r\n\x13\x03TIP :: \x04아래로 붙어서 이동하는 게 좋습니다\r\n\x13\x07=====================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 43", "Location 58");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 43", "Location 58");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 43", Move, "Location 58");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Location 43");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", P6, "Location 43");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 43", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 43", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "자동로봇", P6, "Location 43", m1junbi22[1][1]); -- 미션1 수정목록
		SetSwitch("Switch 1", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 13", Set); -- 공병 자원캐기 비활성화
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");	
		SetMemory(0x515BA8, SetTo, 128);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 킬표시
	players = {AllPlayers},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
	},
	actions = {
		LeaderBoardScore(Custom, "\x06KILL [미션 1에선 120킬까지 가능]");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 킬제한
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Score(CurrentPlayer, Custom, AtLeast, 121);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 120, Custom);
	}
}

	}

Trigger { -- 미션1 뒤쫓는 히드라 생산 공격
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 150, "독좀비", "Location 43");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "독좀비", "Location 57");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "자동로봇", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 61", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		CreateUnit(7, "독좀비", "Location 61", P7);
	    Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 57", Patrol, "Location 57");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 마린 뒤로 가는 거 막기
	players = {Force1},

		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");

		Order("Men", CurrentPlayer, "Location 57", Move, "Location 58");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 힐팩 사용
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 63");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 4, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 63");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Terran Physics Lab");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 65", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 63");
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 65", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 557, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 65", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 65", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 63");
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 65", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 557, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 65", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 65", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 63");
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 65", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 557, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 65", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 65", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 63");
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P9, "Location 65", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 557, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 65", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill4.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill4.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill4.ogg");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\x13\x03상처가 치료되고 힐팩이 바닥났습니다\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Zerg Mutalisk", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 100);
		GiveUnits(4, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P10, "Location 63", P9);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Terran Physics Lab");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 63");
		Bring(P10, AtLeast, 4, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 63");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(4, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P10, "Location 63", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 힐팩 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtMost, 0, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", "Location 63");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", "Location 63", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", P6, "Location 43");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", "Location 63");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", P6, "Location 43", "Location 63");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Command(P6, AtLeast, 2, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 63");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", "Location 43", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 힐팩 이펙트 전용 유닛 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Lurker Egg", "Location 63");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 65", "Zerg Lurker Egg", P12, "Location 63");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Zerg Lurker Egg", "Location 65", P12);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 65", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	   GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P7, "Location 65", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 골럇 도망가기 막기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("자동로봇", P6, "Location 58", Patrol, "Location 57");
	}
}

m1egg = {}; 

table.insert(m1egg, {"바이러스 에그", "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)", "Terran Nuclear Silo", "Zergling\\ZZeRdy00.WAV", "개좀비", 9});
table.insert(m1egg, {"바이러스 크립", "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)", "Normal Mode", "Hydra\\ZHyYes00.WAV", "독좀비", 6});

for i=1,2 do -- 플레이어 유닛 반응, 에그, 크립 유닛 생성
Trigger { 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, m1egg[i][2]);
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location "..70+i);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, m1egg[i][1], "Location "..70+i);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, m1egg[i][1], "Location "..72+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 60, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..72+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, m1egg[i][1], "Location "..72+i, P7);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, m1egg[i][2]);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, m1egg[i][3]);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, m1egg[i][3]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, m1egg[i][3]);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\"..m1egg[i][4].."");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\"..m1egg[i][4].."");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\"..m1egg[i][4].."");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, m1egg[i][2]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, m1egg[i][2]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 102, m1egg[i][2]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, m1egg[i][2]);
		CreateUnit(m1egg[i][6], m1egg[i][5], "Location "..72+i, P7);
		Order(m1egg[i][5], P7, "Location 43", Patrol, "Location 60");
		MoveLocation("Location "..70+i, m1egg[i][1], P7, "Location 43");
		MoveLocation("Location "..72+i, m1egg[i][1], P7, "Location 43");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션1 퀸처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 43");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location 76");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 76");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 77");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 77", P11);
		CreateUnit(2, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 77", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "플라잉 좀비충", P7, "Location 43", P12);
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 43", Move, "Location 59");
		MoveLocation("Location 77", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 43");
		MoveLocation("Location 76", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 43");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "플라잉 좀비충", P7, "Location 43", P12);
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 43", Move, "Location 59");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 43", Move, "Location 59");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 43", Move, "Location 57");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공병 플레이어 따라가기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 18, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
	}
}

for i=1,5 do
Trigger { 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 18, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Command(i-1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 43", Move, "Location "..i);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 공병 드가기 전에 플레이어 들어가려고 할 때
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 24, "통신기");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 62");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "통신기");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 1, "통신기");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "개좀비", "Location 43");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "좀비충", "Location 43");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 62");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "통신기");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\x13\x03개좀비를 모두 없애야 들어갈 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
	}
}

	}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 62");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "개좀비", "Location 43");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "좀비충", "Location 43");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 62", P6);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Unused Terran Bldg type   1");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공병 들어가고 플레이어 들어가기 >> 이후 승리는 플레이어 전멸, 공병 사망 인식 데스값 없을 때 성공처리
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Unused Terran Bldg type   1");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 62");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 62", CurrentPlayer);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 200, "Unused Terran Bldg type   1");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 클리어 (공병 사망, 플레이어 전멸X일 때)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 200, "Unused Terran Bldg type   1");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", Force1);
		SetSwitch("Switch 3", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 3", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", Force1);
		Wait(4500);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", "Location 43", P6);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Terran Starport");
		LeaderBoardScore(Custom, "\x06KILL");
	}
}

	},

	}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 100, "Unused Terran Bldg type   1");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 7, "Terran Valkyrie");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==================\r\n\x13\x06플레이어 전원 사망\r\n\x13\x07==================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\airraid.wav");
		KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", Force1);
		KillUnitAt(All, "군인 - 공병", "Location 43", P6);
		KillUnitAt(All, "자동로봇", "Location 43", P6);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");

Trigger { -- 미션1 다시세팅
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Terran Starport");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Terran Starport");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 42, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 43, "Terran Starport");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "시민", "Location 42");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "시민", "Location 42");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "시민", "Location 42", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "시민", P6, "Location 42");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 재시작 유닛 제거, 퀸 생성용 디파 재설정, 힐팩 디파 재설정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 43, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 44, "Terran Starport");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P8);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "1회용 힐팩 [ 1명당 1번 가능 ]", "Location 43", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 43", Force1);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Easy Mode");
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P10, "Location 63", P9);
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 43", P12);
		MoveLocation("Location 76", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 43");
		MoveLocation("Location 77", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 43");
	}
}

m1re = {}; 

table.insert(m1re, {100, "자동로봇", P6, P10, 101});
table.insert(m1re, {102, "군인 - 공병", P6, P11, 103});
table.insert(m1re, {104, "바이러스 에그", P7, P12, 105});
table.insert(m1re, {106, "바이러스 크립", P7, P10, 107});

for i=1,4 do -- 미션1 재시작골리앗, scv, 에그, 크립 재생성
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 45, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, m1re[i][1], "Easy Mode");
		Bring(7+i, AtLeast, 1, "카메라", "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 44", "카메라", 7+i, "Location 43");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 45, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, m1re[i][1], "Easy Mode");
		Bring(7+i, AtLeast, 1, "카메라", "Location 44");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, m1re[i][2], "Location 44");
		Bring(m1re[i][3], Exactly, 0, m1re[i][2], "Location 44");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, m1re[i][2], "Location 44", P8, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    GiveUnits(1, "카메라", 7+i, "Location 44", m1re[i][4]);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 45, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, m1re[i][1], "Easy Mode");
		Bring(7+i, Exactly, 0, "카메라", "Location 43");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, m1re[i][2], "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Easy Mode");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {		
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 45, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, m1re[i][5], "Easy Mode");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, m1re[i][2], "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 44", m1re[i][2], P8, "Location 43");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {		
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 45, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, m1re[i][5], "Easy Mode");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, m1re[i][2], "Location 44");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, m1re[i][2], P8, "Location 44", m1re[i][3]);
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", m1re[i][4], "Location 44", 7+i);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {		
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Lurker");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 45, "Terran Starport");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, m1re[i][5], "Easy Mode");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, m1re[i][2], "Location 43");
		Bring(m1re[i][3], AtLeast, 1, m1re[i][2], "Location 43");
	},
	actions = {		
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Easy Mode");
	}
}
end

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");

		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 79");

	}
}

Trigger { -- 대화
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 12, "Terran Covert Ops");
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야! 빨리!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 78");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 2000);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 79");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(1000);
		CenterView("Location 79");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F조졌다 씨발…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 79");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 이건 못타고, 아래 발전기 쪽으로 가보자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 79");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3500);
		Wait(3500);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 20, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 대화 이후 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 20, "Terran Covert Ops");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 20, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 81");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", "Location 81");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", "Location 81");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 30, "Terran Covert Ops");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 20, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 81");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", "Location 81");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", "Location 81");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 81");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 30, "Terran Covert Ops");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 대화2
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 30, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 81");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 81");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 4", Set);
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 82");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기도 걍 망한 거 같은데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 81");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F밖으로 나갈 수 있는 게 위에 승강기 밖에 없는겨?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 81");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3500);
		Wait(3500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F하나 더 있긴 해. 존나 뺑이쳐서 돌아가는 거긴 한데……방법이 없으니까 일단 걸로 가자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 81");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4500);
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F오른쪽으로 가면돼. 가자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 81");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		Order("Men", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 84");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 50, "Terran Covert Ops");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 시야 밝히기 용 유닛
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Switch("Switch 4", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnitWithProperties(5, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 81", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 81", "Location 82");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 81", "Location 84");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 81", "Location 88");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 81", "Location 89");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Switch("Switch 4", Set);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 81", "Location 81");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 82", "Location 82");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 84", "Location 84");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 88", "Location 88");
		MoveUnit(1, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 89", "Location 89");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 83");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공병, 소총병 오른쪽 계단 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 50, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 84", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 84", P6);
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 84");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 83", Move, "Location 84");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 이동용 좀비 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 50, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 190, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 20, "좀비", "Location 31");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(10, "좀비", "Location 31", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 웨이트용 데스값 더하기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 50, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 187, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 83");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Terran Covert Ops");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 7피 사라지고 벽 부수는 소리
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 72, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 83");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 88");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\door hit.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\door hit.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\door hit.ogg");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 74, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 83");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 333, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 88", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 벽 부수는 소리 끝, 좀비 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 116, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 83");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveUnit(4, "좀비", P7, "Location 31", "Location 88");
		GiveUnits(All, "좀비", P7, "Location 83", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "좀비", P12, "Location 83", P7);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 188, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 83");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\keryi.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\keryi.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\keryi.ogg");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 83", P6);
        SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1000, "Terran Covert Ops");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션1 클리어 메시지+폭발형 다시 대형에게 100% 데미지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1000, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 83");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 1 :: \x04동굴 탈출 (1) \x1F클리어\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
        PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 31", P7);
		SetMemory(0x515BA8, SetTo, 256);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 07-2. 미션 2 시작 / 기본세팅 (가스 보관실 이펙트)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "실드 무력화 장치", P12, "Location 85");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 110", P12);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "카메라", "Location 110", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "카메라", P7, "Location 85");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P7, "Location 110", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 가스 보관실 가스 부서지면 나오는 12피 건물 없애기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "부서진 가스 보관실", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(1, "부서진 가스 보관실", "Location 85", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미사일런쳐 생산
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 4);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "초소형 미사일 런처", "Location 85");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 85");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 94", "초소형 미사일 런처", P7, "Location 85");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "초소형 미사일 런처", "Location 94", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 94", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P7, "Location 94", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Vulture Spider Mine", P12, "Location 85");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Terran Armory");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 94", "Vulture Spider Mine", P12, "Location 85");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Terran Armory");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P11, "Location 85", P12);
		MoveLocation("Location 94", "Vulture Spider Mine", P12, "Location 85");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 시작+미사일런쳐 생산
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(4000);
		CreateUnit(1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 86", P6);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Terran Armory");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 회피 초기화용
	}
}

Trigger { -- 초반 대화 마린 움직임 막기
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 85", "Location 86");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 85", "Location 86");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 초반 스킬 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 299, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 최초 대화(1) 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(4000);
		CenterView("Location 86");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F2시간 후\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이정도 왔으면 안전하겠지?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야, 그보다 뭐 아는 거 없냐?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F나?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 2000);
		Wait(2);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F어. 아까는 급해서 못 물어봤는데 좀비고 뭐고 여기 상황이 말이 안 되잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F탄광에 뭔 감염체가 저렇게 많아. 몇 백은 그냥 넘을 거 같던데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		Wait(45);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F……아직 비공식 정본데, 감염체 중에 극히 일부는 단독으로 증식이 가능하대.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐라고 해야 되냐, 세포분열? 이런 느낌으로 혼자서 수를 늘린다고 하더라.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5);
		
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 31", P7);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2, "Terran Control Tower");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(4000);
		CenterView("Location 86");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F2시간 후\r\n\r\n", 4);

		Wait(5000);

Trigger { -- 미션2 최초 대화(2) 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F동굴에 있던 애들도 그런 식으로 스스로 혼자서 늘어난 거 같아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5);	
		
		
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F어, 뭐……대충 됐지? 일단 여기 승강기부터 확인하자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3, "Terran Control Tower");
		CenterView("Location 86");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 85", Move, "Location 96");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "가스 보관실", P7, "Location 85", 74);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F동굴에 있던 애들도 그런 식으로 스스로 혼자서 늘어난 거 같아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5000);	
		
		
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F어, 뭐……대충 됐지? 일단 여기 승강기부터 확인하자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3, "Terran Control Tower");
		CenterView("Location 86");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 85", Move, "Location 96");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "가스 보관실", P7, "Location 85", 74);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 86자리 임시 시야 밝히기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 86");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 86", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Zerg Zergling", P6, "Location 85");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공병 위치 고정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 85", Move, "Location 96");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공병 도착 후 플레이어도 이동
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 96");
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(1, "전력제어 기계", P12, "Location 85", P6);
		GiveUnits(1, "구식 발전기", P8, "Location 105", P6);
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 87");
		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 공병", P6, "Location 85", "Location 96");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 85", "Location 87");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 4, "Terran Control Tower");
		GiveUnits(1, "구식 발전기", P8, "Location 105", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 85", "Location 87");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 발전기 도착 후 대화 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 4, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 96");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이거 좀……연료도 모자라고 전원도 나가서 바로는 안 되겠다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F승강기 타려면 다 돌아가야 하거든.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
        DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야야 잠깐만. 요즘 발전기가 가스로 돌아가나?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4);	
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F나도 몰라. 근데 설명서에 그렇게 적혀 있잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 나가서 승강기 좀 봐줄래? 오른쪽에 있어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 5, "Terran Control Tower");
		CenterView("Location 87");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 4, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 96");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이거 좀……연료도 모자라고 전원도 나가서 바로는 안 되겠다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F승강기 타려면 다 돌아가야 하거든.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야야 잠깐만. 요즘 발전기가 가스로 돌아가나?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 86");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);	
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F나도 몰라. 근데 설명서에 그렇게 적혀 있잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 나가서 승강기 좀 봐줄래? 오른쪽에 있어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 5, "Terran Control Tower");
		CenterView("Location 87");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 위로 가는 거 방지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 5, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location 90");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CenterView("Location 103");
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", CurrentPlayer, "Location 90", "Location 103");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 승강기, 가스 보관실 확인 후 대화 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 91");
		Switch("Switch 7", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 7", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 7", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 91");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x04플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여긴 괜찮아. 바로 될 거 같은데?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 91");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3500);
		Wait(35);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F전원 나가서 지금은 못 타.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3500);
		Wait(35);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F왼쪽 위에 연료 보관하는 데 있거든? 거기도 확인 좀 해줘.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5);	
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 20, "Terran Control Tower");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 20, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 92");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "가스 보관실", "Location 92");
		Switch("Switch 8", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 보관실", P7, "Location 85", P6);
		SetSwitch("Switch 8", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 가스 보관실 대화 테스트용 구분

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "가스 보관실", "Location 85");
		Switch("Switch 8", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 92");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x04플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이거 좀 부서진 거 같은데 괜찮나?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 92");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3500);
		Wait(35);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Terran Control Tower");
	}
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 20, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(15, "좀비", "Location 31", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 플레이어 잠시 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 103, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 200, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", Force1, "Location 85", "Location 87");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 다시 문 부수고 좀비 나옴

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 166, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 105, "Terran Control Tower");

	},
	actions = {

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\doot hit2.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\doot hit2.ogg");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 107, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 86");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 119", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 119", P11);
		MoveLocation("Location 119", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 86");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 119", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 119", P11);
		MoveLocation("Location 119", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 86");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 119", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 119", P11);
		MoveLocation("Location 119", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 86");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 119", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 119", P11);
		MoveLocation("Location 119", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 86");
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 86", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 86", P12);
	}
}

	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 167, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 85", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 31", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 85", P12);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 200, "Terran Control Tower");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 좀비 나오고 대사+미션2 시작 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 200, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 87");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐여 저거! 어디서 온 겨?!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 87");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 막아봐! 전력기는 내가 할 테니까 발전기에 연료 좀 채워줘!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5500);
		Wait(55);
		CenterView("Location 87");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 2 :: \x1F동굴 탈출 (2)\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4);
		CenterView("Location 96");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\x13\x03발전기 3대에 각각 가스를 1,000씩 채워야 합니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6);
		CenterView("Location 113");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\x13\x04가스는 가스 보관실에서 얻을 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 43", "Location 58");
		GiveUnits(All, "초소형 미사일 런처", P12, "Location 85", P6);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 공병", AllPlayers, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병", AllPlayers, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "가스 보관실", AllPlayers, "Location 85", 74);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", AllPlayers, "Location 85");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "초소형 미사일 런처", AllPlayers, "Location 85");
		Wait(6);
		CenterView("Location 87");
		Wait(0);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 31", P7);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "가스 보관실", "Location 85", P6);
		SetSwitch("Switch 5", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 13", Set); -- 공병 자원캐기 비활성화해서 타겟 우선 순위 안 밀려나게
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "가스 보관실", P6, "Location 85");
		MoveLocation("Location 119", "전력제어 기계", P6, "Location 85");
		SetResources(P6, SetTo, 1000, Gas);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 125", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 150", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 200, "Terran Control Tower");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 87");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐여 저거! 어디서 온 겨?!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 87");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 막아봐! 전력기는 내가 할 테니까 발전기에 연료 좀 채워줘!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 96");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5500);
		Wait(5500);
		CenterView("Location 87");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 2 :: \x1F동굴 탈출 (2)\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		CenterView("Location 96");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\x13\x03발전기 3대에 각각 가스를 1,000씩 채워야 합니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6000);
		CenterView("Location 113");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\x13\x03가스는 가스 보관실에서 얻을 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 43", "Location 58");
		GiveUnits(All, "초소형 미사일 런처", P12, "Location 85", P6);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 공병", AllPlayers, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병", AllPlayers, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "가스 보관실", AllPlayers, "Location 85", 74);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", AllPlayers, "Location 85");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "초소형 미사일 런처", AllPlayers, "Location 85");
		Wait(6000);
		CenterView("Location 87");
		Wait(0);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 31", P7);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "가스 보관실", "Location 85", P6);
		SetSwitch("Switch 5", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 13", Set); -- 공병 자원캐기 비활성화해서 타겟 우선 순위 안 밀려나게
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "가스 보관실", P6, "Location 85");
		MoveLocation("Location 119", "전력제어 기계", P6, "Location 85");
		SetResources(P6, SetTo, 1000, Gas);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 125", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 150", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 아래 퀸 시야용 저글링
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 96");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "Bengalaas", "Location 96");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "Bengalaas", "Location 119", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Bengalaas", P6, "Location 85");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 공병", "Location 96");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Bengalaas", "Location 96");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Bengalaas", "Location 85", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 브금
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Accumulate(P6, AtMost, 3400, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Right Upper Level Door");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 624, "Right Upper Level Door");
		Accumulate(P6, AtMost, 3400, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Right Upper Level Door");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 킬표시
	players = {AllPlayers},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		LeaderBoardScore(Custom, "\x06KILL [미션 2에선 350킬까지 가능]");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 킬제한
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Score(CurrentPlayer, Custom, AtLeast, 351);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 350, Custom);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 이동용 유닛 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 200, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 39, "개좀비", "Location 31");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnitWithProperties(20, "개좀비", "Location 31", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 유닛 이동 공격용 데스값
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Tank Turret type   1"); -- 퀸, 캐리건, 저글링, 뮤탈 등 공격 유닛
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Start Location"); -- 디바우러 생산
	}
}

	}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(All, "플라잉 좀비충", P7, "Location 85", P12);
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 100", Move, "Location 101");
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 101", Move, "Location 100");
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 99", Move, "Location 86");
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 86", Move, "Location 99");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Ruins");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 85");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Ruins");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Ruins");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 85");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 6, "Ruins");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Ruins");
		RemoveUnit("플라잉 좀비충", P8);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(1, "Protoss Citadel of Adun", P6, "Location 120", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "유은진 원사", "Location 121");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("유은진 원사", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "유은진 원사", "Location 121", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "유은진 원사", P7, "Location 121");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 120");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 120", Move, "Location 120");
	}
}

mi2eq = {20, 60, 100}; 

for i=1,3 do -- 아래 퀸
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, mi2eq[i], "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 40*i, "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 120", "Location 99");
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 양쪽 뮤탈
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 60*i, "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(10, "플라잉 좀비", "Location "..99+i, P7);
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location "..99+i, Patrol, "Location 59");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 85", Patrol, "Location 59");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 85", Patrol, "Location 59");
		Order("좀비충", P7, "Location 85", Patrol, "Location 59");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 저글링
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 120, "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 108", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 109", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		MoveUnit(5, "개좀비", P7, "Location 31", "Location 108");
		MoveUnit(5, "개좀비", P7, "Location 31", "Location 109");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 85", Patrol, "Location 59");
	}
}

}


Trigger { --퀸3말
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 30, "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "Protoss Scout", "Location 86", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P7);
		CreateUnit(3, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P7);
		CreateUnit(2, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P8);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Protoss Scout", "Location 86", P7);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P8);
	}
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");

		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P7);

Trigger { -- 위 캐리건, 퀸, 양쪽 뮤탈, 버러우 저글링 공격 데스값 초기화
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 121, "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Tank Turret type   1");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 화학 바이러스 생산
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 78, "Start Location");

	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Start Location");
		CreateUnit(1, "화학 바이러스", "Location 95", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "화학 바이러스", P7, "Location 85", P12);
		Order("화학 바이러스", P12, "Location 85", Move, "Location 93");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션2 가스 보관실 - 화학 바이러스
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "화학 바이러스", "Location 93");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Normal Mode");
		KillUnitAt(1, "화학 바이러스", "Location 93", P12);
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location 92");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Normal Mode");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Terran\\VESSEL\\TVeDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Terran\\VESSEL\\TVeDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Terran\\VESSEL\\TVeDth00.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Normal Mode");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "카메라", P12, "Location 85");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P12, "Location 110", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "카메라", P12, "Location 85");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P12, "Location 110", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "카메라", P12, "Location 85");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P12, "Location 110", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "카메라", P12, "Location 85");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P12, "Location 110", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Tank Turret type   2");
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P10, "Location 85", P12);
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 113", AllPlayers);
		KillUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 113", AllPlayers);
		KillUnitAt(All, "개좀비", "Location 113", AllPlayers);
		KillUnitAt(All, "독좀비", "Location 113", AllPlayers);
		KillUnitAt(All, "좀비충", "Location 113", AllPlayers);
	}
}

	}
}

Trigger { 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");

Trigger { -- 가스 캐는 쪽 회피 쿨타임 조정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 92");
		Switch("Switch 126", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 126", Set);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 9, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 가스 캐기
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 92");
		Bring(Force1, AtMost, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 92");
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 499, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetResources(CurrentPlayer, Add, 3, Gas);
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 13, "Stasis Cell/Prison");

Trigger { -- 가스 2명 캐기 방지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 92");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 2, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 92");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\x13\x1F가스는 1명만 캘 수 있습니다", 4);
		Order("군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 92", Move, "Location 103");
	}
}

for i=1,4 do -- 가스 500씩만 넣기 가능
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..103+i);
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 499, Gas);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Start Location");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..103+i);
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 499, Gas);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, Gas);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 12, "Start Location");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07====================================\r\n\x13\x1F가스는 한 번에 500씩만 넣을 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07====================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		SetResources(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 100, Gas);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 13, "Start Location");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 49, "Start Location");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Start Location");
	}
}

for i=1,4 do --이미 가스찬 발전기에 갔을 때
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..103+i);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 500, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Scantid (Desert)");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..103+i);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 500, Gas);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 12, "Scantid (Desert)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\x13\x1F이 발전기는 이미 가스가 충전되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 13, "Scantid (Desert)");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 49, "Scantid (Desert)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Scantid (Desert)");
	}
}

mi2gas = {}; 

table.insert(mi2gas, {P8, P7});
table.insert(mi2gas, {P9, P10});
table.insert(mi2gas, {"Scanner Sweep", "Ruins", "Right Wall Missile Trap", "Right Wall Flame Trap"});

for i=1,2 do -- 정상적으로 발전기에 가스 채우기
for m=1,4 do
Trigger { 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..103+m);
		Bring(mi2gas[1][i], AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+m);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 500, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\ZPwrDown.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\ZPwrDown.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\ZPwrDown.wav");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 430, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(50, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..103+m, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		SetResources(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, Gas);
		GiveUnits(1, "구식 발전기", mi2gas[1][i], "Location "..103+m, mi2gas[2][i]);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 20, Custom);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100*i, mi2gas[3][m]);
		SetResources(P6, Add, 500, Gas);
	}
}
end
end

for i=1,4 do
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi2gas[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, mi2gas[3][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 109, mi2gas[3][i]);
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\x13\x03"..i.."번 발전기 가스양 \x04[ 500 / 1,000 ]\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 110, mi2gas[3][i]);
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "구식 발전기", P9, "Location "..103+i, P7);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, mi2gas[3][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 209, mi2gas[3][i]);
		Bring(P10, AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================\r\n\x13\x1F"..i.."번 발전기가 가동되었습니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\PRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\PRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\PRescue.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 210, mi2gas[3][i]);
		Bring(P10, AtLeast, 1, "구식 발전기", "Location "..103+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "구식 발전기", P10, "Location "..103+i, P6);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, mi2gas[3][i]);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션 2 가스 - 가스양에 따라 구식 발전기 실드 조정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "구식 발전기", P6, "Location 85", 100);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "구식 발전기", P7, "Location 85", 50);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "구식 발전기", P8, "Location 85", 0);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "전력제어 기계", P12, "Location 85", 0);
	}
}

for i=0,4 do
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 85");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, i, "구식 발전기", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "전력제어 기계", P6, "Location 85", i*25);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 발전기 전부 가동 [클리어루트]
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 300, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Terran Control Tower");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 4, "구식 발전기", "Location 85");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2000, "Terran Control Tower");
		SetResources(Force1, SetTo, 0, Gas);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 12피 퀸, 디바우러 없애고 도망가기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2000, "Terran Control Tower");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2120, "Terran Control Tower");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(All, "화학 바이러스", P7, "Location 85", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "플라잉 좀비충", P7, "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 86", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "화학 바이러스", "Location 95", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 86", P12); -- 위쪽 퀸
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 99", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 120", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 121", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 114", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 100", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 101", P7);
		Order("화학 바이러스", P12, "Location 85", Move, "Location 95");	
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 90", Move, "Location 86"); -- 위쪽 퀸
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "Location 103", Move, "Location 86");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 114", Move, "Location 114"); -- 위쪽 뮤탈
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 113", Move, "Location 114");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 93", Move, "Location 114");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 252", Move, "Location 114");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 252", Move, "Location 96"); -- 위쪽 지상 좀비
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 252", Move, "Location 96");
		Order("좀비충", P7, "Location 252", Move, "Location 96");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 108", Move, "Location 100"); -- 왼쪽 뮤탈
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 104", Move, "Location 100");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 105", Move, "Location 100");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 116", Move, "Location 100");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 109", Move, "Location 101"); -- 오른쪽 뮤탈
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 107", Move, "Location 101");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 106", Move, "Location 101");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 117", Move, "Location 101");
	}
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2000, "Terran Control Tower");
