Trigger { -- 미션3 클리어 이후 대화
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 9, "Right Pit Door");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 216, "Psi Disrupter");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 5, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 154");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 154");
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 154");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이제 다 왔어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 154");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이거 그냥 길 따라서 가면 돼?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 154");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F내려가면 바로 나와.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 154");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 가서 어디 있는지 확인부터하자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 154");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1000, "Psi Disrupter");
	}
}

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F처음엔 흙탕물이 섞여 있어서 잘 안 보이는데, 좀만 가면 바로 햇빛이 보여서 괜찮아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 6000);
		Wait(6000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F길은 내가 아니까 앞장설게.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야야 잠만. 그전에 좀 쉬자. 여기 들어오고 계속 좀비만 봤잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 5000);
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F나도 좀 쉬고 싶은데. 지금 다리 존나 후들거리고 뒤질 거 같아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 5000);
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F좀비도 여기까진 안 오는 것 같으니까 좀 쉬었다 가자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 5000);
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그래 그럼. 난 길 좀 확인해보고 올 테니까 준비되면 말해줘.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 151");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 5000);
		Wait(5000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1002, "Psi Disrupter");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F알았어.\r\n\r\n", 4);

		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1003, "Psi Disrupter");
	}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 9, "Right Pit Door");

	}

Trigger { -- 미션3 클리어 메시지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 9, "Right Pit Door");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1069, "Psi Disrupter");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 143", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "승강기", "Location 143", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Zerg Lurker", "Location 141", P5);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 3 :: \x04동굴 탈출 (3) \x1F클리어\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		SetSwitch("Switch 14", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 10", Clear); -- 미션3 전용 스킬 쿨 표시 다시 끄기 / 층수 표시 끄기
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 9, "Right Pit Door");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1117, "Psi Disrupter");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 10", Clear); -- 미션3 전용 스킬 쿨 표시 다시 끄기 / 층수 표시 끄기
		
		SetMemory(0x515BA8, SetTo, 256); -- 폭발형
		SetMemory(0x515BD0, SetTo, 256); -- 일반형
	}
}

Trigger { -- 07-4. 미션 4 시작 / 테스트 레이스
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "공군 - 전투기", "Location 155");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Location 155");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Location 155");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "공군 - 전투기", "Location 161", P6);
		CreateUnit(1, "공군 - 전투기", "Location 165", P6);
		CreateUnit(1, "공군 - 전투기", "Location 166", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Location 155", P5);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 17 테스트 / 미션4 테스트

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "공군 - 전투기", "Location 165");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "공군 - 전투기", P6, "Anywhere");
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 167", 0);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "광신도", P7, "Location 176", 0);
	}
}

mi4 = {};

table.insert(mi4, {"포탑", "군사 텐트", "군인 - 소총수", "군인 - 장교", "최양훈 대위", "신진호 대령", "권인빈 상사"});
table.insert(mi4, {"카메라", "카메라", "카메라", "Zerg Zergling", "Zerg Zergling", "Zerg Zergling", "Zerg Hydralisk"});
table.insert(mi4, {P9, P10, P11, P9, P10, P11, P9});

for i=1,7 do -- 미션4 시작 전에 버러우 유닛 배치
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, mi4[1][i], "Location 155");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i-1, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Switch("Switch 23", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 156", mi4[1][i], P12, "Location 155");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, mi4[2][i], "Location 156", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		GiveUnits(1, mi4[2][i], P7, "Location 156", mi4[3][i]);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, mi4[1][i], "Location 156", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, mi4[1][i], "Location 155");
		Bring(mi4[3][i], AtLeast, 1, mi4[2][i], "Location 155");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i-1, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Switch("Switch 23", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 7, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Switch("Switch 23", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 23", Set);
	}
}

for i=1,7 do -- 미션4 시작 전 진짜 유닛 배치
Trigger { -- 1
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6+i, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Bring(mi4[3][i], AtLeast, 1, mi4[2][i], "Location 155");
		Switch("Switch 23", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 156", mi4[2][i], mi4[3][i], "Location 155");
		GiveUnits(1, mi4[2][i], mi4[3][i], "Location 156", P12);
		CreateUnit(1, mi4[1][i], "Location 156", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, mi4[1][i], P7, "Location 155");
		GiveUnits(1, mi4[1][i], P7, "Location 156", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 2
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6+i, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Bring(mi4[3][i], AtLeast, 1, mi4[2][i], "Location 155");
		Switch("Switch 23", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 156", mi4[2][i], mi4[3][i], "Location 155");
		GiveUnits(1, mi4[2][i], mi4[3][i], "Location 156", P12);
		CreateUnit(1, mi4[1][i], "Location 156", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, mi4[1][i], P7, "Location 155");
		GiveUnits(1, mi4[1][i], P7, "Location 156", P12);
	}
}

for i=1,7 do --
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6+i, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Bring(mi4[3][i], Exactly, 0, mi4[2][i], "Location 155");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, mi4[2][i], "Location 155");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, mi4[1][i], "Location 155");
		Switch("Switch 23", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(All, mi4[2][i], P12, "Location 155", mi4[3][i]);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 7+i, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션4 유닛 배치 끝
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 14, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "카메라", "Location 155");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 155");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 155");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "권인빈 상사", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
	}
}

	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Nuclear Missile");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Norad II (Crashed Battlecruiser)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Norad II (Battlecruiser)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Mojo (Scout)");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 31", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 31", P8);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 시작 전에 플레이어 스킬 쿨타임 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 119, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1071, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 회피 초기화용
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 시작
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 12, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 최초 대화 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 13, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 161");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F동굴에서 탈출한 뒤 우리는 222연대 생존자들이 합류한 111연대 본부로 돌아왔다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F돌아가는 상황을 들을 수 있었는데, 군부대가 거의 괴멸 상태라고 한다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F특히 장교 피해가 극심해서 좀비 사태가 터지고 밝혀진 수치로만 28%가 전사했다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(5);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F111연대도 병사들을 제외하면 연대장인 신진호 대령과 소위 5명이 전부라\r\n\x13\x1F부대가 제대로 돌아가지 않고 있다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(8);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이전에 우리가 연대장의 명령으로 갔던 곳도 원래라면 앞에서 좀비를 막아줄 병력이\r\n\x13\x1F제대로 배치가 안 돼서 생긴 일이라고 한다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(9);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 20, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 13, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 161");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F동굴에서 탈출한 뒤 우리는 222연대 생존자들이 합류한 111연대 본부로 돌아왔다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F돌아가는 상황을 들을 수 있었는데, 군부대가 거의 괴멸 상태라고 한다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F특히 장교 피해가 극심해서 좀비 사태가 터지고 밝혀진 수치로만 28%가 전사했다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F111연대도 병사들을 제외하면 연대장인 신진호 대령과 소위 5명이 전부라\r\n\x13\x1F부대가 제대로 돌아가지 않고 있다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(8000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이전에 우리가 연대장의 명령으로 갔던 곳도 원래라면 앞에서 좀비를 막아줄 병력이\r\n\x13\x1F제대로 배치가 안 돼서 생긴 일이라고 한다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		Wait(9000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 20, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 유닛 주기, 시야 밝히기용
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 20, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 36, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		GiveUnits(All, "포탑", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "군사 텐트", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "지휘관 막사", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "군인 - 소총수", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "군인 - 장교", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "최양훈 대위", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "신진호 대령", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		GiveUnits(All, "권인빈 상사", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "군인 - 장교", P7, "Location 155", 12); 
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Any unit", P6, "Location 155");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 마린 고정(대위쪽)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 50, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 99, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", Force1, "Location 155", "Location 167");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 50, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 79, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 추가 대화 테스트용 구분(1)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 80, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(2);
		CenterView("Location 167");
		Wait(15);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F어……그러면 지원군이 여기로 온다는 말씀입니까?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그래. 우린 아예 움직일 수가 없어서 그쪽에서 보내주기로 했어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 4500);
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그 다음엔 아마, 12사단으로 가서 부대를 재편성 할 거야.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		
		
		
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F……그나저나, 사태가 점점 심해지고 있어. \r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그냥 좀비였던 애들이 점점 괴물로 변하고 있다고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 5000);
		Wait(5);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 90, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 추가 대화 테스트용 구분(2)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 90, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이거, 빨리 해결 못하면 진짜 어떻게 될지 몰라.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 5000);
		Wait(5);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4bisa.wav");
		Wait(2);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03연대 통신병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F저, 전방에 좀비들이 몰려옵니다!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("통신기", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아니 뭔……연대장님은?!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 3000);
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03연대 통신병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이전처럼 각자 위치를 지키라고 하십니다!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("통신기", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F알았다. 다들 일어나! 좀비다! 전투준비!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 4000);
		Wait(4);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 90, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이거, 빨리 해결 못하면 진짜 어떻게 될지 몰라.\r\n\r\n", 4);

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");

		TalkingPortrait("통신기", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아니 뭔……연대장님은?!\r\n\r\n", 4);

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("통신기", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F알았다. 다들 일어나! 좀비다! 전투준비!\r\n\r\n", 4);

		MinimapPing("Location 167");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}

Trigger { -- 마린 고정(대령있는 중앙)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 110, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", Force1, "Location 155", "Location 168");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 시작(적 유닛 공격, 마린 고정 해제, 이전 미션 없애기) -- 테스트용 구분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 31", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 31", P8);
		CenterView("Location 168");
		Wait(1);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 4 :: \x1F기지 수비\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===========================================================\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령, 최양훈 대위, 권인빈 상사 중 하나라도 죽으면 미션 실패\r\n\x13\x07===========================================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(7);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================================\r\n\x13\x03마린의 마나가 200이 되면 E 스킬로 EMP를 사용할 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(7);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 115, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Any unit", P6, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Location 155");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "Any unit", AllPlayers, "Location 155", 100);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");
		SetCountdownTimer(SetTo, 376);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P9);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1071, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Zerg Mutalisk", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", "Location 155", P5);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 31", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 31", P8);
		CenterView("Location 168");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 4 :: \x1F기지 수비\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===========================================================\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령, 최양훈 대위, 권인빈 상사 중 하나라도 죽으면 미션 실패\r\n\x13\x07===========================================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(7000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07======================================================\r\n\x13\x03마린의 마나가 200이 되면 E 스킬로 EMP를 사용할 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07======================================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(7000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 115, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Any unit", P6, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Location 155");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "Any unit", AllPlayers, "Location 155", 100);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");
		SetCountdownTimer(SetTo, 376);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 43", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 83", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 85", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 122", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 143", P9);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1071, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Zerg Mutalisk", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", "Location 155", P5);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 테스트용 킬조정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 119, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		SetScore(Force1, SetTo, 520, Custom);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		SetScore(Force1, SetTo, 550, Custom);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 카운터 클리어 인식
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 115, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 119, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 유닛 설정(오버, 아비터, 유닛 흘리기 방지)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 36", Move, "Location 36");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 종합 유닛 정리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 36", 0);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 155", 100);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "광신도", P7, "Location 31", 5);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "실드 무력화 장치", P6, "Location 155", 10);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군용 헬기", P6, "Location 155", 100);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "광신도", P7, "Location 31", 100);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 36");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 캐논", P7, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군용 헬기", P6, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군용 헬기", P12, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 155");
		GiveUnits(All, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "군용 헬기", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		MoveUnit(All, "독좀비", P7, "Location 36", "Location 192");
		MoveUnit(All, "독좀비", P7, "Location 191", "Location 192");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 192", Patrol, "Location 192");
		Order("광신도", P7, "Location 31", Move, "Location 31");
		Order("플라잉 자폭 좀비", P12, "Location 155", Move, "Location 161");
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 169", Move, "Location 167");
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 170", Move, "Location 180");
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 199", Move, "Location 169"); -- 왼쪽
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 199", Move, "Location 169");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 199", Move, "Location 169");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 199", Move, "Location 169");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 199", Move, "Location 169");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 200", Move, "Location 171"); -- 중앙
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 200", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 200", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 200", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 200", Move, "Location 171");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 201", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 201", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 201", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 201", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 201", Move, "Location 171");
		
		Order("바이러스 집합체", P7, "Location 155", Move, "Location 161");
		Order("바이러스 집합체", P8, "Location 155", Move, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 202", Move, "Location 170"); -- 오른쪽
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 202", Move, "Location 170");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 202", Move, "Location 170");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 202", Move, "Location 170");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 202", Move, "Location 170");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");

		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 203", Patrol, "Location 165");

		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 204", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 204", Patrol, "Location 161");

		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 205", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 205", Patrol, "Location 161");

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Jump Gate");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Jump Gate");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 36, "Jump Gate");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 365);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 20);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Jump Gate");
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 왼쪽
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161"); -- 중앙
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166"); -- 오른쪽
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161"); -- 자폭 좀비
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 36, "Jump Gate");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 19);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Jump Gate");
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 왼쪽

		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");

		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");

		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166"); -- 오른쪽

		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");

Trigger { -- 드랍쉽 처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Kakaru");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location 155");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 24, "Kakaru");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Kakaru");
		Order("군용 헬기", P6, "Location 190", Move, "Location 167");
		Order("군용 헬기", P6, "Location 193", Move, "Location 168");
		Order("군용 헬기", P6, "Location 194", Move, "Location 180");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 마린 마나 조정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 119, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 155", 0);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");

		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 369);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 193", 0);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 501, "Protoss Robotics Facility");

		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 155", 0);

mi4mana = {};

table.insert(mi4mana, {"Nuclear Missile", "Norad II (Crashed Battlecruiser)", "Norad II (Battlecruiser)"});
table.insert(mi4mana, {190, 193, 194});

for i=1,3 do -- 이동하면 마나 0고정 / 특정 카운트 지나면 이동할 경우 분신 스킬쿨 초기화
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, mi4mana[1][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast,1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..mi4mana[2][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, mi4mana[1][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 380);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 361);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 50, mi4mana[1][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..mi4mana[2][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4mana[1][i]);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 155", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 360);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 50, mi4mana[1][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..mi4mana[2][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4mana[1][i]);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 155", 0);
	}
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 중앙 마린 분신 시간 조정
for m=1,2 do
Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, m-1, "Uraj Crystal");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 339, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 325, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch "..71+i, Cleared);
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 358);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[i], "Location 193");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..71+i, Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, m, "Uraj Crystal");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 350*(1+m-1), "Zerg Larva");
	}
}
end
end

for i=1,5 do --
for m=1,2 do
Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, m-1, "Uraj Crystal");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 339, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 325, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch "..71+i, Cleared);
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 358);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 193");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..71+i, Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, m, "Uraj Crystal");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 350*(1+m-1), "Zerg Larva");
	}
}
end
end

mi4rightb = {};

table.insert(mi4rightb, {190, 194});

for i=1,2 do -- 분신 2.5초 추가
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 32, "Ragnasaur (Ash World)");
		Switch("Switch "..120+i, Cleared);
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 358);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 180);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "분신", "Location "..mi4rightb[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..120+i, Set);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 30, "Ragnasaur (Ash World)");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", CurrentPlayer, "Location "..mi4rightb[1][i], 100);
	}
}
end

mi4s = {167, 168, 180};

for i=1,3 do -- 미션4 플레이어 넘어가기 방지
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location "..184+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", CurrentPlayer, "Location "..184+i, "Location "..mi4s[i]);
		CenterView("Location "..mi4s[i]);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션4 리콜용 히드라 미리 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 5, "독좀비", "Location 191");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 50, "독좀비", "Location 192");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(10, "독좀비", "Location 191", P7);
	}
}

mi4s2 = {};

table.insert(mi4s2, {11, 12});
table.insert(mi4s2, {167, 180});
table.insert(mi4s2, {"Warp Gate", "Warbringer (Reaver)"}); -- 아비터

table.insert(mi4s2, {"Protoss Assimilator", "Power Generator"}); -- 히드라 리콜 후 공격

Trigger { -- 미션4 아비터 처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 11", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 11", Clear);
		MoveUnit(1, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 36", "Location 169");
		MoveUnit(1, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 36", "Location 170");
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 169", Move, "Location 167");
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 170", Move, "Location 180");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Warp Gate");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Warbringer (Reaver)");
	}
}

for i=1,2 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, mi4s2[3][i]);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..168+i);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..186+i*4);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s2[3][i]);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Protoss Robotics Support Bay");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Arbi.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Arbi.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Arbi.ogg");
		TalkingPortrait("플라잉 붐버", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location "..168+i);		
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, mi4s2[3][i]);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..168+i);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..186+i*4);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s2[3][i]);	
	}
}
end

	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");

	},
	actions = {

		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location "..186+i*4, Patrol, "Location "..164+i);
	}
}

	players = {P7},
	conditions = {

		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");

		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "독좀비", "Location "..186+i*4);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Subtract, 1, mi4s2[4][i]);
	}
}

	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4s2[4][i]);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "독좀비", "Location "..186+i*4);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4s2[4][i]);
	}

mi4s3 = {"Nuclear Missile", "Norad II (Crashed Battlecruiser)", "Norad II (Battlecruiser)", "Mojo (Scout)"};

for i=1,4 do -- 아비터 생산
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6, P7, P8},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi4s3[i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 123, mi4s3[i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, mi4s3[i]);
	}
}
end

mi4s4 = {};

table.insert(mi4s4, {"Mineral Field (Type 3)", "Mineral Field (Type 2)"});
table.insert(mi4s4, {167, 180});

table.insert(mi4s4, {"분신 [2단계]", "Ion Cannon"}); -- 짐레이너(벌처)
table.insert(mi4s4, {"Protoss Cybernetics Core", "Protoss Citadel of Adun"});

table.insert(mi4s4, {190, 194});
for i=1,2 do -- 아비터 미션 지역 벗어나기 방지 (최근에 수정한 거)
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[5][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location "..mi4s4[5][i], Move, "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 아비터 미션 지역 벗어나기 방지 (예전에 쓰던 거)
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..187+i);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, mi4s4[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, mi4s4[1][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..187+i);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 18, mi4s4[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4s4[1][i]);
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location "..187+i, Move, "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4s4[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4s4[1][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..187+i);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4s4[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4s4[1][i]);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 아비터 리콜 흉내
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 30, "독좀비", "Location "..208+i*2);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 100, mi4s4[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, mi4s4[3][i]);
		Order("플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location "..mi4s4[2][i], Move, "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4s4[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4s4[3][i]);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 
Trigger { -- 1(9)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 30, mi4s4[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 1
        GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 2
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 3
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 4
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 5
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 6
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 7
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 8
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 9
	}
}

Trigger { -- 2(9)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 30, mi4s4[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 1
        GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 2
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 3
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 4
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 5
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 6
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 7
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 8
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 9
	}
}

Trigger { -- 3(7)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 30, mi4s4[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 9, mi4s4[3][i]);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, mi4s4[4][i]);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 1
        GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 2	
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 3
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 4
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 5
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 6
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P7, "Location 192", P8);
		MoveUnit(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", "Location "..208+i*2);
		MoveLocation("Location "..209+i*2, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..209+i*2, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "독좀비", P8, "Location "..186+i*4, P7); -- 7
		
		GiveUnits(All, "독좀비", P8, "Location 192", P7);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 플레이어 리콜 소리
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..186+i*4);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi4s4[4][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s4[4][i]);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\ARBITER\\PAbFol00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\ARBITER\\PAbFol00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\ARBITER\\PAbFol00.WAV");		
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..186+i*4);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi4s4[4][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s4[4][i]);	
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 한 지역에 아비터 2개 이상이면 1개 죽이기
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 2, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Switch("Switch "..110+i, Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..110+i, Set);
		ModifyUnitShields(1, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location "..mi4s4[2][i], 0);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 1, "플라잉 붐버", "Location "..mi4s4[2][i]);
		Switch("Switch "..110+i, Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..110+i, Clear);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 중앙 자폭 좀비 X 지점
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 183");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 183");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 183");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, Add, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
		GiveUnits(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", P12, "Location 183", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 183", P7);
		CreateUnit(6, "자폭 좀비", "Location 168", P7);
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}

for i=1,5 do --
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i);
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, Add, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
		GiveUnits(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", P12, "Location "..65+i, CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnitAt(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i, CurrentPlayer);
		CreateUnit(6, "자폭 좀비", "Location "..25+i, P7);
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location "..25+i, Patrol, "Location "..25+i);
	}
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 마린 오버로드
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[i]);
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i);
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, Add, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
		GiveUnits(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", P12, "Location "..65+i, CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnitAt(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location "..65+i, CurrentPlayer);
		CreateUnit(6, "자폭 좀비", "Location "..25+i, P7);
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location "..25+i, Patrol, "Location "..25+i);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 193");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\OVERLORD\\ZOvRdy00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\OVERLORD\\ZOvRdy00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\OVERLORD\\ZOvRdy00.WAV");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 193");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 100, "Terran Covert Ops");
	}
}

mi4s6 = {};

table.insert(mi4s6, {"Rhynadon (Badlands)", "Raszagal (Dark Templar)"});
table.insert(mi4s6, {"Protoss Forge", "Protoss Fleet Beacon"});

for i=1,2 do -- 프로브 처리
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
		Switch("Switch "..20+i, Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..20+i, Set);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
		Switch("Switch "..20+i, Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..20+i, Clear);
		KillUnitAt(All, "바이러스 캐논", "Location "..175+i, P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 215, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..175+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch "..18+i, Set);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..18+i, Clear);
		MoveUnit(1, "광신도", P7, "Location 31", "Location "..175+i);
		Order("광신도", P7, "Location "..175+i, Move, "Location "..175+i);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, mi4s6[1][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch "..18+i, Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..18+i, Clear);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, mi4s6[1][i]);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..186+(i*4));
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s6[1][i]);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==================================\r\n\x13\x08※ 바이러스 캐논이 감지 되었습니다 ※\r\n\x13\x07==================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Protoss Gateway"); -- 캐논 소환 체크(테스트용)
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\PTrWht001.WAV");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\PTrWht001.WAV");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\PTrWht001.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("광신도", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location "..175+i);		
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, mi4s6[1][i]);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..186+(i*4));
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s6[1][i]);	
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(1, "광신도", P7, "Location "..175+i, 30*i);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 캐논", "Location "..175+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("광신도", P7, "Location "..175+i, Move, "Location "..175+i);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "광신도", "Location "..175+i);
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location "..175+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location "..175+i, P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	}
}
end

mi4ves = {};

table.insert(mi4ves, {"Protoss Robotics Facility", "Protoss Observatory"});

for i=1,2 do -- 미션4 배슬처리
Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi4ves[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 200, mi4ves[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, mi4ves[1][i]);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 118, mi4ves[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 200, mi4ves[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4ves[1][i]);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 155", CurrentPlayer);
	},
}
end

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 155", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 킬표시
	players = {AllPlayers},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
	},
	actions = {
		LeaderBoardScore(Custom, "\x06KILL");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 브금
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 600, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 7);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 600, "Vulture Spider Mine");

	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");
	}
}

mi4s7 = {};

table.insert(mi4s7, {345, 315,   303, 285, 255,   241, 225,   211, 195, 165, 135,   120, 105,   90,    80,    65, 40,   25});
table.insert(mi4s7, {330, 260, 175, 145, 42});

-- 아비터 345, 315, 285, 255, 225, 195, 165, 135, 105, 75, 45
-- 아비터 240, 210, 121, 90, 30
-- 프로브 330, 260, 175, 145, 50

-- 아래는 인페 커멘드
table.insert(mi4s7, {350, 325, 300, 275, 250, 225, 200, 175, 150, 125, 100, 75, 50});
table.insert(mi4s7, {P7, P8, P7, P8, P7, P8, P7, P8, P7, P8, P7, P8, P7, P8, P7, P8}); -- 4

table.insert(mi4s7, {360, 240, 180, 120});
table.insert(mi4s7, {241, 181, 121, 1}); -- 6

for i=1,18 do -- 미션4 아비터 소환
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i-1, "Warp Gate");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, mi4s7[1][i]);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Warp Gate");
		SetSwitch("Switch 11", Set);
	}
}
end

		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Khalis Crystal");
		SetSwitch("Switch 19", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 20", Set);
	}
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 143");
	},

		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 143", Move, "Location 143");
		MoveUnit(All, "플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 143", "Location 171");
	}
}

mi4inpecr = {};

table.insert(mi4inpecr, {81, 89});

for i=1,2 do -- 인페 커멘드 없으면 생산 + 이동으로 위치 고정 + 피통 100프로 고정
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Command(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 집합체");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location "..mi4inpecr[1][i], 5+i, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = true,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 0,
			energy = 0,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("바이러스 집합체", 5+i, "Location 83", Move, "Location "..mi4inpecr[1][i]);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "바이러스 집합체", 5+i, "Location 83", 100);
	}
}
end

		CountdownTimer(AtMost, mi4s7[3][i]);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 40);
	},

		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, i, "Independent Command Center");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "바이러스 집합체", P7, "Location 83", 100);

	}
}

		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");

	},

	}

		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");

	},
