Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 120, mi4s7com[i]);
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 193");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4s7com[i]);
        PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Bldg\\ZNeWht00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Bldg\\ZNeWht00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Bldg\\ZNeWht00.wav");
        MinimapPing("Location "..177+i); 	
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\x13\x08바이러스 집합체가 다가오고 있습니다\r\n\x13\x04EMP 스킬로 죽일 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 인페 커멘드 X지점 도달 / 커세어도 다시 이동
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 183");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 집합체", 5+i, "Location 183", P12);
		KillUnitAt(1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 183", P12);
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 155", "Location 82");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Assimilator");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Goliath Turret");
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..177+i, P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 168", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 334, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 183", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}
end

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Goliath Turret");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Goliath Turret");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 104, "Goliath Turret");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Goliath Turret");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(20, "자폭 좀비", "Location 168", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Assimilator");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 193");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 100, "Protoss Assimilator");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\Explo5.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\Explo5.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\Explo5.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Assimilator");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 193");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Assimilator");
	}
}

for i=1,2 do -- 인페 커멘드 유닛 생산(1)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
        Deaths(5+i, AtMost, 50, "Easy Mode");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 189");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(5+i, SetTo, 136, "Easy Mode");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
        Deaths(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "Easy Mode");
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(5+i, SetTo, 0, "Easy Mode");
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 인페 커멘드 유닛 생산(2)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
        Deaths(5+i, AtLeast, 100, "Easy Mode");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 189");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(5+i, Add, 1, "Easy Mode");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
        Deaths(5+i, AtLeast, 136, "Easy Mode");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 189");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(5+i, SetTo, 100, "Easy Mode");
		CreateUnit(3, "그레이트 좀비", "Location "..190+i, P8);
		MoveUnit(All, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..190+i, "Location "..177+i);
		
		MoveLocation("Location "..177+i, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..177+i);
		GiveUnits(1, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..177+i, P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 60, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..177+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		
		MoveLocation("Location "..177+i, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..177+i);
		GiveUnits(1, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..177+i, P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 60, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..177+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		
		MoveLocation("Location "..177+i, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..177+i);
		GiveUnits(1, "그레이트 좀비", P8, "Location "..177+i, P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 60, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..177+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location "..190+i, P8);
        Order("그레이트 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 커세어 고정용 + 상태 처리
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 83");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 83", Move, "Location 82");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 83");
		ModifyUnitShields(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 83", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 83", 100);
		SetDeaths(5+i, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 155로 커멘드 이동하면 커세어도 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..177+i, "바이러스 집합체", 5+i, "Location 155");
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 83", "Location "..177+i);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 커세어 커맨드 따라가기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 155", Move, "Location "..177+i);
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 인페 커멘드 EMP 맞고 죽는 거 오류 방지용
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(5+i, AtLeast, 1000, "Terran Supply Depot");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(1, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155", 5+i);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(5+i, AtLeast, 1000, "Terran Supply Depot");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 155", "Location 82");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(5+i, AtLeast, 1000, "Terran Supply Depot");
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(5+i, SetTo, 0, "Terran Supply Depot");
	}
}

mi4inpeco = {};

table.insert(mi4inpeco, {"Unused type   2", "Unused type   1"});


for i=1,2 do -- 커멘드 없으면 커세어 다시 82로 이동 요류 방지용
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 11, mi4inpeco[1][i]);
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, mi4inpeco[1][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1, mi4inpeco[1][i]);
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, mi4inpeco[1][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 12, mi4inpeco[1][i]);
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 155");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, mi4inpeco[1][i]);
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 155", "Location 83");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 커세어 무적 적용
	players = {AllPlayers},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 해독 장치", CurrentPlayer, "Location 155");
	}
}

mi4s8 = {};

table.insert(mi4s8, {"울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "좀비"});
table.insert(mi4s8, {"좀비", "개좀비", "독좀비", "좀비", "개좀비", "독좀비", "좀비", "개좀비", "독좀비", "좀비", "개좀비", "독좀비"});
table.insert(mi4s8, {"울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비", "울트라 좀비", "좀비", "좀비"});

table.insert(mi4s8, {"울트라 좀비", "좀비", "울트라 좀비", "울트라 좀비"});
table.insert(mi4s8, {"독좀비", "개좀비", "독좀비", "개좀비"});

for i=1,12 do -- 미션4 시작 카운트&공격 시작 (시작~240)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 119+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");	
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 370-10*i);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 120+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 50);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[1][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 172"); -- 왼쪽
		CreateUnit(32, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 169", P7);
		CreateUnit(20, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 169", P7);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[1][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 173"); -- 오른쪽
		CreateUnit(32, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 170", P7);
		CreateUnit(20, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 170", P7);
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 37"); -- 중앙
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 39");
		CreateUnit(38, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 171", P7);
		CreateUnit(7, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(7, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 175", P7);		
		CreateUnit(10, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(10, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 175", P7);
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 명령
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}
end

for i=1,12 do -- (240~120)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 131+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");	
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 250-10*i);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 132+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 65);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[1][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 172"); -- 왼쪽
		CreateUnit(35, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 169", P7);
		CreateUnit(19, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 169", P7);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[1][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 173"); -- 오른쪽
		CreateUnit(35, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 170", P7);
		CreateUnit(19, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 170", P7);
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 37"); -- 중앙
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 39");
		CreateUnit(39, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 171", P7);
		CreateUnit(7, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(7, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 175", P7);
		CreateUnit(10, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(10, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 175", P7);
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 명령
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}

for i=1,8 do -- (120~50)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 143+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");	
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 130-10*i);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 144+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 80);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[1][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 172"); -- 왼쪽
		CreateUnit(38, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 169", P7);
		CreateUnit(19, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 169", P7);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[1][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 173"); -- 오른쪽
		CreateUnit(38, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 170", P7);
		CreateUnit(19, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 170", P7);
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 37"); -- 중앙
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 39");
		CreateUnit(38, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 171", P7);
		CreateUnit(6, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(6, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 175", P7);
		CreateUnit(9, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(9, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 175", P7);
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 명령
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}
end

for i=9,10 do -- (40~)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 143+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");	
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 114-8*i);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 144+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		
		MoveUnit(1, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", "Location 172"); -- 왼쪽
		CreateUnit(40, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 169", P7);
		CreateUnit(22, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 169", P7);
		
		MoveUnit(1, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", "Location 173"); -- 오른쪽
		CreateUnit(40, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 170", P7);
		CreateUnit(22, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 170", P7);
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 37"); -- 중앙
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 38");
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 39");
		CreateUnit(38, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 171", P7);
		CreateUnit(6, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(6, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 175", P7);
		CreateUnit(9, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(9, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 175", P7);
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 명령
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");

		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");

Trigger { -- 왼쪽, 오른쪽 드랍쉽 타이밍에 뮤탈 맞추기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 156, "Protoss Robotics Facility");	
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 13);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 157, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		CreateUnit(24, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 169", P7); -- 왼쪽
		CreateUnit(24, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 170", P7); -- 오른쪽
	
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 167");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 180");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 중앙 드랍쉽 타이밍에 뮤탈 맞추기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 13);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
		Switch("Switch 70", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 70", Set);
		
		CreateUnit(15, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 174", P7); -- 중앙
		CreateUnit(15, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 175", P7);
	
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 168");
	}
}

for i=1,2 do -- (10~)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 156+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");	
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 15-5*i);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 157+i, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		
		MoveUnit(1, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", "Location 172"); -- 왼쪽
		CreateUnit(40, mi4s8[2][i+1], "Location 169", P7);
		
		MoveUnit(1, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", "Location 173"); -- 오른쪽
		CreateUnit(40, mi4s8[2][i+1], "Location 170", P7);
		
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 37"); -- 중앙
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 38");
		MoveUnit(1, mi4s8[3][i], P7, "Location 36", "Location 39");
		CreateUnit(30, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 171", P7);
		CreateUnit(14, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 174", P7);
		CreateUnit(14, mi4s8[2][i], "Location 175", P7);
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165"); -- 명령
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 190", Patrol, "Location 165");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 193", Patrol, "Location 161");
		
		Order("울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("개좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		Order("독좀비", P7, "Location 194", Patrol, "Location 166");
		
		Order("자폭 좀비", P7, "Location 155", Patrol, "Location 161");
	}
}

mi4reset = {};

table.insert(mi4reset, {P6, P6, P6, Force1});
table.insert(mi4reset, {"최양훈 대위", "신진호 대령", "권인빈 상사", "군인 - 소총병"});
table.insert(mi4reset, {"Warbringer (Reaver)", "Mature Crysalis", "Map Revealer", "Magellan (Science Vessel)"});

table.insert(mi4reset, {KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1), KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1), KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1), DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==================\r\n\x13\x06플레이어 전원 사망\r\n\x13\x07==================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0)});
table.insert(mi4reset, {KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1), KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1), KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1), PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\airraid.wav")});

for i=1,4 do -- 미션4 플레이어&NPC 전멸 재시작
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(mi4reset[1][i], Exactly, 0, mi4reset[2][i], "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, mi4reset[3][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4reset[3][i]);
		Bring(mi4reset[1][i], AtLeast, 1, mi4reset[2][i], "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4reset[3][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, mi4reset[3][i]);
		Bring(mi4reset[1][i], Exactly, 0, mi4reset[2][i], "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 155", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 7, mi4reset[3][i]);
		Bring(mi4reset[1][i], Exactly, 0, mi4reset[2][i], "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "실드 무력화 장치", "Location 155", Force1);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 155", P6);
		mi4reset[4][i];
		mi4reset[5][i];
		KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P6);
		KillUnit("군용 헬기", P12);
		KillUnit("군용 헬기", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 100, "Protoss Cybernetics Core");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 9, mi4reset[3][i]);
		Bring(mi4reset[1][i], Exactly, 0, mi4reset[2][i], "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, mi4reset[3][i]);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 600, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션4 카운트 초기화
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 600, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetCountdownTimer(SetTo, 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 다시세팅
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 600, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("플라잉 자폭 좀비", P12, "Location 155", Move, "Location 171");
		Order("바이러스 집합체", AllPlayers, "Location 155", Move, "Location 171");
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1071, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 시민 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 642, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 643, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "시민", "Location 42");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "시민", "Location 42");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "시민", "Location 42", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "시민", P6, "Location 42");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 재시작 화면 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 642, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 713, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CenterView("Location 42");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 유닛 배치 중 무적&풀피&플레이어 마린 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 642, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 155", "Location 168");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Any unit", AllPlayers, "Location 155");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "Any unit", AllPlayers, "Location 155", 100);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 재시작 유닛 제거
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 645, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 646, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "플라잉 붐버", P7, "Location 155", "Location 36");
		MoveUnit(All, "광신도", P7, "Location 155", "Location 31");
		MoveUnit(All, "바이러스 집합체", P7, "Location 155", "Location 81");
		MoveUnit(All, "바이러스 집합체", P8, "Location 155", "Location 89");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 집합체", "Anywhere", P12);
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", P7, "Location 155", "Location 81");
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", P8, "Location 155", "Location 89");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 155");
		MoveUnit(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 155", "Location 36");
		MoveUnit(All, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 155", "Location 36");
		GiveUnits(All, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 36", P7);
		KillUnit("군용 헬기", P12);
		KillUnit("군용 헬기", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 143", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location 191", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location 192", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location 155", AllPlayers);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 648, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 649, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 155", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 198", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 198", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 155", P12);
		KillUnit("군용 헬기", P12);
		KillUnit("군용 헬기", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 143", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location 191", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location 192", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "그레이트 좀비", "Location 155", AllPlayers);
		MoveUnit(All, "바이러스 집합체", P7, "Location 155", "Location 81");
		MoveUnit(All, "바이러스 집합체", P8, "Location 155", "Location 89");
		
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "바이러스 해독 장치", P7, "Location 83", 100);
		ModifyUnitShields(All, "바이러스 해독 장치", P8, "Location 83", 100);
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "바이러스 해독 장치", P7, "Location 83", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "바이러스 해독 장치", P8, "Location 83", 100);
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "바이러스 집합체", P7, "Location 83", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "바이러스 집합체", P8, "Location 83", 100);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 재시작 각종 데스값 등 초기화
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 610, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 650, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 36");
		
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P7, "Location 36", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 36", 100);	
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 25", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 28", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 70", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 72", Clear); -- 중앙 마린 분신쿨 조정
		SetSwitch("Switch 73", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 74", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 75", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 76", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 121", Clear); -- 오른쪽 분신 2초 추가용
		SetSwitch("Switch 122", Clear);
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Vulture Spider Mine"); -- 브금
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 회피 초기화용
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Warp Gate"); -- 아비터
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Khalis Crystal"); -- 프로브
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Left Pit Door"); -- 배슬
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Kyadarin Crystal Formation");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Mineral Field (Type 1)"); -- 오버로드
        SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Independent Command Center"); -- 인페 커멘드	
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Goliath Turret");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Warbringer (Reaver)"); -- NPC&플레이어 사망 인식
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Mature Crysalis");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Map Revealer");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Magellan (Science Vessel)");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Citadel of Adun"); -- 배슬&NPC 재배치
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Left Wall Missile Trap"); -- 지원군 도착
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Left Wall Flame Trap");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Left Upper Level Door");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Kakaru"); -- 드랍쉽 2초마다 이동
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Jump Gate"); -- 유닛 계속 공격
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 인페 커멘드 체력,실드 인식
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Uraj Crystal"); -- 중앙 마린 분신쿨 조정
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Terran Supply Depot"); -- 커멘드, 커세어 안 죽거나 이동 안 하는 오류 방지용
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Unused type   1"); -- 커멘드 없을 때 커세어 이동 안 하는 거 오류 방지용
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Unused type   2");
		
		SetDeaths(P8, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
		SetDeaths(P8, SetTo, 0, "Terran Supply Depot");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Wall Missile Trap"); -- 드랍쉽 소리
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Unused type   1");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Temple");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Robotics Facility"); -- 배슬 재생산
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Observatory");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Robotics Support Bay"); -- 아비터 소환 체크
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Robotics Facility"); -- 190 배슬 emp
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Observatory"); -- 194 배슬 emp
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Gateway"); -- 프로브 소환 체크
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Power Generator"); -- 인페 커멘드 소리
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Assimilator");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 841, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetCountdownTimer(SetTo, 376);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Any unit", P6, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Any unit", P7, "Location 155");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Any unit", Force1, "Location 155");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "Any unit", AllPlayers, "Location 155", 100);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 115, "Protoss Robotics Facility"); -- 미션4 다시 시작
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 216, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1071, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Zerg Mutalisk", "Location 155", P5);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", "Location 155", P5);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 지원군
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 120, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 15);
		Switch("Switch 25", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 25", Set);
		CreateUnit(4, "군용 헬기", "Location 195", P7);
		CreateUnit(4, "군용 헬기", "Location 196", P7);
		CreateUnit(4, "군용 헬기", "Location 197", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "군용 헬기", P7, "Location 195", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "군용 헬기", P7, "Location 196", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "군용 헬기", P7, "Location 197", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군용 헬기", P12, "Location 195");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군용 헬기", P12, "Location 196");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군용 헬기", P12, "Location 197");
		Order("군용 헬기", P12, "Location 195", Move, "Location 167");
		Order("군용 헬기", P12, "Location 196", Move, "Location 168");
		Order("군용 헬기", P12, "Location 197", Move, "Location 180");
	}
}

mi4cl = {};

table.insert(mi4cl, {190, 193, 194});
table.insert(mi4cl, {167, 168, 180});

table.insert(mi4cl, {"Left Wall Missile Trap", "Left Wall Flame Trap", "Left Upper Level Door"});
table.insert(mi4cl, {18, 30, 42, 54, 66, 78, 90, 102, 114}); 
table.insert(mi4cl, {"Left Wall Missile Trap", "Protoss Unused type   1", "Protoss Temple"}); --5

table.insert(mi4cl, {169, 171, 170}); --6
table.insert(mi4cl, {"최양훈 대위", "신진호 대령", "권인빈 상사"});

for i=1,3 do -- 미션4 지원군
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location "..184+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("Men", P6, "Location "..mi4cl[1][i], Patrol, "Location "..mi4cl[2][i]);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 310, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, mi4cl[3][i]);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location "..mi4cl[2][i]);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4cl[7][i], "Location "..mi4cl[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, mi4cl[3][i]);
	}
}
end

for i=1,3 do -- 미션4 지원군 처음 탱크
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 310, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 18, mi4cl[3][i]);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location "..mi4cl[2][i]);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4cl[7][i], "Location "..mi4cl[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, mi4cl[5][i]);
		CreateUnit(4, "탱크", "Location 198", P7);
		Order("탱크", P7, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		GiveUnits(4, "탱크", P7, "Location 198", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "탱크", P12, "Location 198");
		MoveUnit(4, "탱크", P12, "Location 198", "Location "..mi4cl[2][i]);
		GiveUnits(All, "탱크", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "탱크", P6, "Location 155");
		Order("탱크", P6, "Location "..mi4cl[1][i], Patrol, "Location "..mi4cl[6][i]);
	}
}
end

for i=1,3 do -- 
for m=1,12 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 310, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 18+12*m, mi4cl[3][i]);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location "..mi4cl[2][i]);
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, mi4cl[7][i], "Location "..mi4cl[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, mi4cl[5][i]);
		CreateUnit(4, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 198", P7);
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P7, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		GiveUnits(4, "군인 - 소총병", P7, "Location 198", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", P12, "Location 198");
		MoveUnit(4, "군인 - 소총병", P12, "Location 198", "Location "..mi4cl[2][i]);
		GiveUnits(All, "군인 - 소총병", P12, "Location 155", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 155");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location "..mi4cl[1][i], Patrol, "Location "..mi4cl[6][i]);
	}
}
end
end

for i=1,3 do -- 드랍쉽 소리
Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi4cl[5][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..mi4cl[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4cl[5][i]);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TDrTra01.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TDrTra01.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TDrTra01.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, mi4cl[5][i]);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location "..mi4cl[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, mi4cl[5][i]);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션4 클리어 조건 충족
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 310, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 320, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 150, "Left Wall Flame Trap");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Warbringer (Reaver)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Mature Crysalis");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Map Revealer");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Magellan (Science Vessel)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location 155");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "최양훈 대위", "Location 155");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "신진호 대령", "Location 155");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "권인빈 상사", "Location 155");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 155");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Location 155");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 330, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 378, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 380, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 150, "Left Wall Flame Trap");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Warbringer (Reaver)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Mature Crysalis");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Map Revealer");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Magellan (Science Vessel)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "Location 155");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "최양훈 대위", "Location 155");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "신진호 대령", "Location 155");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "권인빈 상사", "Location 155");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 155");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Location 155");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Location 155");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		CreateUnit(1, "군인 - 장교", "Location 167", P6);
		CreateUnit(1, "군인 - 장교", "Location 168", P6);
		CreateUnit(1, "군인 - 장교", "Location 180", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 지원군 오고 정리 후에 대화
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 143", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 143", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Location 143", P8);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이번엔…정말 위험했어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03지원군 지휘관\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F연대장님, 괜찮으십니까?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 장교", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F어어, 그래. 덕분에 살았다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03지원군 지휘관\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아닙니다. 저희도 사단이랑 특전사 쪽에서 지원을 받아서 겨우 왔습니다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 장교", 5000);
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03지원군 지휘관\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F근처 좀비들은 대부분 정리됐습니다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 장교", 3500);
		Wait(3500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그래. 우선, 가기 전에 잠깐 재정비를 해야겠어. 저기 있는 우리 중대장이랑 보안담당관 좀 불러주겠나?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 161");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 6000);
		Wait(6000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1, P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", Force1);
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Clear);
		RunAIScript("Turn OFF Shared Vision for Player 6");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3100, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 3200, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3160, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 4000, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 155", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Buildings", "Location 155", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Buildings", "Location 155", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Buildings", "Location 155", P11);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Buildings", "Location 155", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Buildings", "Location 155", P9);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 집합체", "Location 83", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 198", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 198", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "독좀비", "Location 191", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "독좀비", "Location 191", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "독좀비", "Location 192", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "독좀비", "Location 192", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 물자 창고 바닥 무너지는 거 효과 이펙트 전용
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3172, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 3499, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "기생 바이러스", "Location 220");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 110");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "기생 바이러스", P12, "Location 220");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "기생 바이러스", "Location 110", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3172, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 3499, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3172, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 3499, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 110");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 102, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 110", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 110", P12);
	}
}

for i=1,2 do --  미션4 물자 창고 바닥 무너지는 거 하면 이동 전용
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3172, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 3499, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 220");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 3-i, "박재현 대위", "Location 220");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location "..80-i, "박재현 대위", P12, "Location 220");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "박재현 대위", "Location "..80-i, P12);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션4 화면 이동 후 설명 (테스트 대화 구분)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3172, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 168");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F지원군이 도착한 후, 사단에 합류하는 과정에서 문제가 생겼다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F신진호 대령은 병력만 한꺼번에 헬기에 태워 이동하려고 했으나\r\n\x13\x1F사단 측에서는 그렇게 되면 물자를 지킬 병력이 없으니\r\n\x13\x1F병력과 물자를 같이 헬기에 태우라고 지시했다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(8);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그러나 병력과 물자를 모두 실어 나르기엔 헬기가 턱없이 부족했다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F근처 좀비를 대부분 죽였지만 이곳에 오래 남아있는 건\r\n\x13\x1F위험하다고 이야기 했으나 받아들여지지 않았다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(7);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F결국 일부 병력과 인솔 간부만 물자와 함께 헬기에 타고\r\n\x13\x1F대부분은 이곳에 남아 물자를 정리하고 다시 지원군을 기다리는 처지가 됐다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(8000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3250, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3172, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 168");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F지원군이 도착한 후, 사단에 합류하는 과정에서 문제가 생겼다\r\n\r\n", 4);

		MinimapPing("Location 168");

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(8000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그러나 병력과 물자를 모두 실어 나르기엔 헬기가 턱없이 부족했다\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F근처 좀비를 대부분 죽였지만 이곳에 오래 남아있는 건\r\n\x13\x1F위험하다고 이야기 했으나 받아들여지지 않았다\r\n\r\n", 4);

		MinimapPing("Location 168");
		Wait(7000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F결국 일부 병력과 인솔 간부만 물자와 함께 헬기에 타고\r\n\x13\x1F대부분은 이곳에 남아 물자를 정리하고 다시 지원군을 기다리는 처지가 됐다\r\n\r\n", 4);

		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3300, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3400, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(1000);
		MoveLocation("Location 217", "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Anywhere");
		CenterView("Location 217");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기로 가면 탄약 창고 나오는 거 맞지? 무전기는 챙겼냐?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F있으니까 그만 좀 물어봐.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F바닥 조심해. 여기 지반이 불안정해서 가끔 땅도 꺼진대.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F……? 난 처음 듣는데? 아니, 시발 그럼 소대장 걔는 우릴 여기에 왜 보낸 거야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F남의 자식이라 걍 위험한 곳에 던진 거 같긴 해.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F와, 나, 다른 연대라고 차별하는 실화야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 29", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 6피 마린 대화할 때 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3250, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(5, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 217", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 217");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 217", Move, "Location 218");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 218");
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 218");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 도착
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3400, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 218");
		Switch("Switch 29", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Anywhere", "Location 218");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 218", Move, "Location 218");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 3500, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		MoveLocation("Location 217", "좀비사용1", P12, "Anywhere");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "좀비사용1", "Location 217", P12);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 219", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {

	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Anywhere", Move, "Location 218");
	}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3600, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 219");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4after1.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4after1.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4after1.ogg");
		Wait(1500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 30", Set);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4after2.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4after2.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi4after2.ogg");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x04플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F으아아아!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병", P6);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 100, "Mineral Field (Type 2)");
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 222");
		SetSwitch("Switch 32", Set);
		Wait(7500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 4 :: \x04기지 수비 \x1F클리어\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 102, "Mineral Field (Type 2)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Mineral Field (Type 2)");
		Switch("Switch 30", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Mineral Field (Type 2)");
	}
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {

		Switch("Switch 30", Set);

	}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 32", Set);

	},

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 4, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 3600, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		Switch("Switch 30", Set);
		Switch("Switch 32", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220"); --3
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220"); --6
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220"); 
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220"); 
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 110", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 220"); --9
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 110", P11);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 110", P7);	
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 220", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 219", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 마지막 부분 전 6피 건물 12한테 주기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(All, "무기고", P6, "Location 220", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "탄약", P6, "Location 220", P12);
	}
}

for i=1,10 do -- 07-5. 미션 5 시작 / 유닛, 이펙트 배치 (빠르게 배치하려고 여러 개 만듦)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "기생 바이러스", "Location 224");
		Bring(P11, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 223");
		Switch("Switch 35", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "기생 바이러스", P12, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "기생 바이러스", P12, "Location 223", P11);
		SetSwitch("Switch 35", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 223");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 1, "기생 바이러스", "Location 223");
		Switch("Switch 35", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "기생 바이러스", "Location 223", P11);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 223");
		Bring(P11, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 223");
		Switch("Switch 35", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 35", Clear);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Zergling", "Location 223", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	}
}
end

for i=1,2 do -- 미션4에서 썼던 커세어 옮겨두기
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(5+i, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 192");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Anywhere", "Location 192");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(5+i, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 해독 장치", "Location 192");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("바이러스 해독 장치", 5+i, "Location 192", Move, "Location 192");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션5 시작 독립적 크기 다시 원상 복귀
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemory(0x515B9C, SetTo, 0);
		SetMemory(0x515BB0, SetTo, 0);
		SetMemory(0x515BC4, SetTo, 0);
		SetMemory(0x515BD8, SetTo, 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 시야 밝히기용 12피 디파일러
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 224");
		Bring(P11, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 224");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 224");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P12);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "카메라", "Location 223", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	}
}

mi5defilo = {57,58,60,75};

for i=1,4 do -- 미션5 시작하면 디파 생성 위치로 로케 이동
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 224");
		Bring(P11, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 224");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 5-i, "Data Disc", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location "..mi5defilo[i], "Data Disc", P12, "Location 224");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Data Disc", "Location 224", P12);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션5 시작 (오프닝)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 150, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "기생 바이러스", "Location 224");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Cocoon", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 118, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Set); -- 시야 일시 차단한 거 다시 풀어주기
		SetSwitch("Switch 32", Clear); -- 미션4 끝나고 마린 떨어질 때 화면 이동했던 거 중지
		CreateUnit(5, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 221");
		RemoveUnit("광신도", P7);
		RemoveUnit("광신도", P8);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 118, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 221", "Location 221");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스전 시작 전 스킬 고정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 10, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 600, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker"); -- 힐은 처음부터 바로 사용 가능한 상태로 둠
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 회피 초기화용
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 대화 시작 수정본(1)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 136, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 221");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F으……다들 괜찮아?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F크게 다치진 않은 거 같아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F무전기는?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 2500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F안 돼.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 2000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(2000);
		
		
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아니 씨발 사단장도 병신이고 진짜.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야야, 일단 나중에 하고, 여기 나가는 거부터 생각하자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 71", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 136, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 221");
		Wait(1);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F으……다들 괜찮아?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F크게 다치진 않은 거 같아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F무전기는?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 2500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(25);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F안 돼.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 2000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(2);
		
		
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아니 씨발 사단장도 병신이고 진짜.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야야, 일단 나중에 하고, 여기 나가는 거부터 생각하자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(45);
		SetSwitch("Switch 71", Set);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 대화 시작 수정본(2)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 136, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221");
		Switch("Switch 71", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기 좀 어디에 쓰이는 장소 같지 않아? 뭔 제단? 그런 분위기 나는데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 좀 가볼까? 어차피 위에 무너져서 다른 길도 없고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기 가만히 있어봐야 해결되는 것도 아니잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 160, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Wait(2000);
		GiveUnits(1, "실험체", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		Wait(1000);
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P7, "Location 224", P6); -- 위에 미션5 장소 시야 밝혀주기
		Wait(1000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 170, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 136, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221");
		Switch("Switch 71", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기 좀 어디에 쓰이는 장소 같지 않아? 뭔 제단? 그런 분위기 나는데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 좀 가볼까? 어차피 위에 무너져서 다른 길도 없고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기 가만히 있어봐야 해결되는 것도 아니잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 160, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Wait(2000);
		GiveUnits(1, "실험체", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		Wait(1000);
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P7, "Location 224", P6); -- 위에 미션5 장소 시야 밝혀주기
		Wait(1000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 170, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 대화 중 잠시 광신도 배치+비콘 주기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 160, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --2
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --3
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --4
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --5
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --6
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --7
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P11, "Location 224"); --8
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "광신도", "Location 223", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "광신도", P7, "Location 224");
		
		GiveUnits(All, "가스 비콘", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "미네랄 비콘", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 실험체 이펙트 반복
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 179, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 160, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "실험체", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 225", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 다시 대화 부분
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 170, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야, 잠깐 저기…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 2000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(2000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		CenterView("Location 225");
		Wait(2750);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		Wait(2750);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐, 뭔…중얼거리는 거 같은데? 사이비야 뭐야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(45);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F방금 위에 무너지고 그렇게 큰 소리가 났는데 아무도 모르는 건가? 뭐지?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 5000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(5);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F저 사람들 눈이 다 풀린 거 같아……좀 소름끼치는데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F잠깐, 저기 실험체 쪽에 뭔가……!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3000);
		CenterView("Location 225");
		Wait(750);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 17
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 170, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F야, 잠깐 저기…….\r\n\r\n", 4);

		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 2000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(2000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		CenterView("Location 225");
		Wait(2500);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		Wait(2500);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi51.ogg");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐, 뭔…중얼거리는 거 같은데? 사이비야 뭐야?\r\n\r\n", 4);

		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F방금 위에 무너지고 그렇게 큰 소리가 났는데 아무도 모르는 건가? 뭐지?\r\n\r\n", 4);

		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 5000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F저 사람들 눈이 다 풀린 거 같아……좀 소름끼치는데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F잠깐, 저기 실험체 쪽에 뭔가……!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(3000);
		CenterView("Location 225");
		Wait(750);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
