Trigger { -- 보스 나오기 전 이펙트+소리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 222, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 222, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 20
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 25
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 222, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Witness\\PWiDth01.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Witness\\PWiDth01.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Witness\\PWiDth01.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 222, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Mineral Field (Type 1)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 222, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 180, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, "Mineral Field (Type 1)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Mineral Field (Type 1)");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Witness\\PWiDth01.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Witness\\PWiDth01.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Witness\\PWiDth01.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 3차 다크 아칸 폭발
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 272, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 272, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 20
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 223", P8);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 928, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 25
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 282, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 5차 리콜 + TE에 보스 등장
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 297, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(20, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 225", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "실험체", "Location 225", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 보스 등장 이후 광신도 전멸
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 305, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(1000);
		CenterView("Location 225");
		Wait(250);
		TalkingPortrait("바이러스 가디언", 2000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi5boss.wav");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi5boss.wav");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi5boss.wav");
		Wait(1750);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 310, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\mi5bossmine.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 310, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(5, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225", P8);
		GiveUnits(5, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225", P9);
		GiveUnits(5, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225", P10);
		GiveUnits(5, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225", P11);
		GiveUnits(5, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 225", P12);
	}
}

	players = {P6},

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 311, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(10, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 225", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7); -- 5
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 312, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 225");

		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");

		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");

		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);

		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225", P7);

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7); -- 15
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 313, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7); -- 20
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 225", P7);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 429, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(1, "광신도", "Location 73", P7); -- 25
		KillUnitAt(All, "광신도", "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 321, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 330, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 보스가 플레이어 공격
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 330, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3500);
		CenterView("Location 225");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\ARCHON\\PArDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\ARCHON\\PArDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\ARCHON\\PArDth00.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("바이러스 가디언", 4000);
		Wait(500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여, 여기 본다!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 221");
		Wait(2500);
		CenterView("Location 221");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 335, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Wait(0);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 340, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}


Trigger { -- 진짜 옵저버 소환 후 파괴
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 335, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(30, "좀비사용1", "Location 221", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "좀비사용1", "Location 221", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 플레이어 마린 생산
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 340, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 73", "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P10, "Location 224");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", P10);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 221", P6);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 343, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 마린 고정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 499, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 340, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 224", "Location 73");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 224");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 마린 넘어가는 거 이펙트 + 아비터 생산
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 343, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(1000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 345, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 348, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 345, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 345, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(5, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 73", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "분신 [1단계]", P7, "Location 224");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 349, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 345, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "분신 [1단계]", P7, "Location 224");
		CreateUnit(1, "Kakaru", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Kakaru", "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 223", P7);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "분신 [1단계]", P7, "Location 224");
		CreateUnit(1, "Kakaru", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Kakaru", "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 223", P7);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "분신 [1단계]", P7, "Location 224");
		CreateUnit(1, "Kakaru", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Kakaru", "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 223", P7);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "분신 [1단계]", P7, "Location 224");
		CreateUnit(1, "Kakaru", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Kakaru", "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 223", P7);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "분신 [1단계]", P7, "Location 224");
		CreateUnit(1, "Kakaru", "Location 223", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Kakaru", "Location 224", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "분신 [1단계]", "Location 223", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 아비터(영웅)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 347, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie");
		CreateUnit(1, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 198", P7);
		CreateUnit(5, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", "Location 198", P8);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", P8, "Location 198");
		GiveUnits(1, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", P8, "Location 198", P9);
		GiveUnits(1, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", P8, "Location 198", P10);
		GiveUnits(1, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", P8, "Location 198", P11);
		GiveUnits(1, "Danimoth (Arbiter)", P8, "Location 198", P12);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 350, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스전 시작
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 350, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 73");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F저 미친 사이비 새끼들 뭔 짓을 한 거야?!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 5 :: \x1F바이러스 가디언 제거\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		CenterView("Location 73");
		Wait(4000);
		CenterView("Location 73");
        GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P12, "Location 224", P7);
        GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
        GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 600, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker");
		
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 237, "Zerg Larva"); -- 분신 나누기
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 475, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 713, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 951, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 224");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");	
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		MoveLocation("Location 134", "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224"); -- 스커지 4방향 날아오는 패턴용(스커지 파괴)
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스전 시작(17)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 350, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 73");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F저 미친 사이비 새끼들 뭔 짓을 한 거야?!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(2);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 5 :: \x1F바이러스 가디언 제거\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		CenterView("Location 73");
		Wait(4);
		CenterView("Location 73");
        GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P12, "Location 224", P7);
        GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
        GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 600, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker");
		
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 237, "Zerg Larva"); -- 분신 나누기
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 475, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 713, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 951, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 224");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm2.ogg");	
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		MoveLocation("Location 134", "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224"); -- 스커지 4방향 날아오는 패턴용(스커지 파괴)
	}
}

mi5life = {20, 10, 5};

for i=1,3 do -- 미션5 공유 목숨 설정
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 502, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, mi5life[i], "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 237, "Zerg Larva"); -- 분신 나누기
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 475, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 713, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 951, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 502, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, i, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, mi5life[i]+900, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 237, "Zerg Larva"); -- 분신 나누기
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 475, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 713, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 951, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션5 8피 색 1피로 바꾸기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 39", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 39", Set);
		PColor(7, 111);
	}
}

for i=1,5 do -- 1회용 마컨 시간 조정
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 596, "Easy Mode");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 567, "Easy Mode");
		Switch("Switch "..61+i, Cleared);
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..61+i, Set);
        SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 566, "Easy Mode");
	}
}
end

for i=1,5 do -- 1회용 마컨 시간 조정 / 17 테스트
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 596, "Easy Mode");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 567, "Easy Mode");
		Switch("Switch "..61+i, Cleared);
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch "..61+i, Set);
        SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 566, "Easy Mode");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 공유 목숨 소멸 알림 메시지 / 죽으면 3초 후 부활
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1000, "분신 [2단계]"); -- 부활용 데스값
		SetDeaths(P6, Subtract, 1, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 죽고 부활 트리거
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 1998, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1000, "분신 [2단계]");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		Switch("Switch 56", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "분신 [2단계]");
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Goliath Turret"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언 안 없애서 나온 전멸기
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Independent Command Center"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언이 플레이어 피격 인식
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Left Wall Flame Trap");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Left Upper Level Door");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Left Pit Door");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Kyadarin Crystal Formation");
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Khaydarin Crystal Formation"); -- 1-1,3,4 패턴 마린 데미지 계산
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)"); -- 1-2 패턴 폭발 데미지 인식
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret2"); -- 1-4 패턴 마린 움직임 감지 50 데미지
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret1"); -- 디바우러 닿으면 데미지 렉 방지용 카운트
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 회피 시간 줄어드는 거 방지
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Dark Templar (Hero)"); -- 1-5 패턴 대미지 계산
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Dark Swarm"); -- 스카웃 대미지
		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Cantina"); -- 일반 패턴 대미지
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Bengalaas"); -- 플레이어 리콜 소리
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 1999, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1036, "분신 [2단계]");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		Switch("Switch 56", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2000, "분신 [2단계]");
		CenterView("Location 73");
		DisplayText("\x13\x07===================================\r\n\x13\x04공유 목숨을 1개 소모하고 부활했습니다\r\n\x13\x032.5초간 무적 상태가 적용됩니다\r\n\x13\x07===================================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 73", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\revive.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\revive.ogg");	
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\revive.ogg");
        SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie");	
	}
}

Trigger { -- 부활 후 2.5초간 무적
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 2998, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2000, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 50, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "분신 [2단계]");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 50, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 224");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 2998, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2000, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "분신 [2단계]");
	}
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2030, "분신 [2단계]");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 50, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "분신 [2단계]");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");

	}

Trigger { -- 공유 목숨 소진해서 패배
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Switch("Switch 56", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 56", Set);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Switch("Switch 56", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 56", Clear);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");

		Switch("Switch 56", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Uraj Crystal");
	}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
	},

		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
	}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		Switch("Switch 56", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 241", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 7, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		Switch("Switch 56", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07================\r\n\x13\x06공유 목숨 소진\r\n\x13\x07================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\airraid.wav");
		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 가디언", AllPlayers, "Location 224");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 가디언", P9, "Location 224");
	
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 224", P6); -- 셔틀 제거
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 221", P6);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 224", P6); -- 디파 제거
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", Force1, "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Dark Swarm", "Anywhere", P12); -- 다크 스윔 제거
		
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7); -- 이펙트 제거
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 241", AllPlayers); -- 반피 이하 패턴 스카웃 제거
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 241", P9);
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 224", Force1); -- 플레이어 유닛 파괴
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", AllPlayers); -- 가디언 파괴
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P9);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P10);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P11);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P12);		
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 224", P7); -- 플라잉 좀비 파괴
		
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7); -- 비콘 12피한테 주기
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret2"); -- TE 트리거 / 지원사격으로 피 200깎는 거 인식하는 용도
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker"); -- TE 트리거 / 아칸 체력바 없어지면 사망 카운트
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Larva");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 9, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 7, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		Switch("Switch 56", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 224", Force1);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 221", P6);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", AllPlayers); -- 가디언 제거
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P9);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P10);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P11);
		KillUnitAt(All, "역병", "Location 224", P12);
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 241", AllPlayers); -- 반피 이하 패턴 스카웃 제거
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 241", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 공유 목숨 소진하고 플레이어 & 6피 색 원래대로
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 9, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		Switch("Switch 56", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		PColor(5, 84); -- 6피 색깔 흰색
		
		PColor(0, 111); -- 플레이어 색 원래대로
		PColor(1, 165);
		PColor(2, 159);
		PColor(3, 164);
		PColor(4, 156);
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 재시작 ( 카운트 데스값 )
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1998, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 재시작 스위치 초기화
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 45", Clear); -- 랜덤 자원 조절용
		SetSwitch("Switch 46", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 47", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 48", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 49", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 50", Clear); -- 1-3 패턴 미네랄&가스 바꾸는 거 1회만 하도록 인식
		SetSwitch("Switch 51", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 52", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 53", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 54", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 55", Clear); -- 1-3 패턴 시간 더 주는 용도(1)
		SetSwitch("Switch 56", Clear); -- 공유 목숨 1일 때 마지막으로 죽는 거 인식
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 57", Clear); -- 2-1 패턴 오류 방지
		SetSwitch("Switch 59", Clear); -- 1-3 패턴 시간 더 주는 용도(2)
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 60", Clear); -- 치료기계 인식으로 6피 색깔 흰색으로 해주기
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 61", Clear); -- 2-1 패턴 시간 조절용
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 62", Clear); -- 1회용 마컨 시간 조정
		SetSwitch("Switch 63", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 64", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 65", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 66", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 67", Clear); -- 보스 사망 인식
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 96", Clear); -- 1-5 패턴 시간 더 주는 용도
		SetSwitch("Switch 97", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 98", Clear); -- 일반 패턴 저그 죽는 이펙트 녹색으로 바꾸기 용도
		SetSwitch("Switch 99", Clear); -- 녹색 원래대로 되돌리기
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 100", Clear); -- 일반 패턴 폭발 소리
		SetSwitch("Switch 101", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 102", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 103", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 104", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 105", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 106", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 107", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 108", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 109", Clear);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 재시작 데스값 초기화
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)"); -- 공유 목숨
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Disruption Field"); -- 셔틀색 초기화
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)"); -- 공유 목숨 소진으로 전멸 카운트
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc"); -- 패턴 사용 중일 때 아칸은 공격 중지
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Dark Swarm"); -- 1-1 패턴에서 가디언 빨리 안 없애면 전멸기
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Cocoon");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Cantina");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Bengalaas");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Arcturus Mengsk (Battlecruiser)");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Alan Turret"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언 안 없애서 나온 즉사 패턴 카운트
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret2"); -- TE 트리거 / 지원사격
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate"); -- 17 테스트 / 2-1 마컨 패턴 때 마린 마컨하러 중앙으로 이동
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)"); -- 17 테스트 / 1-2 패턴 때 마린 마컨하러 이동
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)"); -- 17 테스트 / 1-2 패턴 때 마린 마컨하러 이동
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 랜덤 패턴 결정값+패턴 쿨타임
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Extractor"); -- 패턴 랜덤
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Evolution Chamber"); -- 셔틀이 따라가는 플레이어 정하기
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"); -- 셔틀 아래 할루 이펙트
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)"); -- 마컨 소비용 패턴&2-1 뮤탈 패턴
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple"); -- 마컨 3회 인식용
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Warp Gate"); -- 셔틀 빨리 사라지게 하기
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Warbringer (Reaver)"); -- 다크 스윔 없애는 카운트용
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Vulture Spider Mine"); -- 1-5 패턴 끝나고 2-1 패턴 2번에 1번 나오게 하기
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)"); -- 반피 이하되면 디바우러 생성, TE에서 보스피 인식해서 1,000만들어줌.	
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker"); -- TE 트리거 / 아칸 체력바 없어지면 사망 카운트
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Ursadon (Ice World)"); -- 보스 사망 처리 이펙트
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Uraj Crystal"); -- 일반 패턴 카운트용
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Unused Zerg Bldg 5"); -- 2-2 패턴에서 디파 위치 알려주기
				
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 600, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "군인 - 소총병"); -- 실제 마린 죽은 수 초기화				
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Mature Crysalis"); -- 브금
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Map Revealer"); -- 패턴 알림 메시지
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Kakaru"); -- 역병 패턴 소리 (가디언 나오는 거)
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "분신 [2단계]"); -- 부활용 카운트 및 2.5초 무적 판정
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Ion Cannon"); -- 스킬 관련 / 마컨 시간 감소되는 현상 방지, 보스 마컨 인식
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 스킬 관련 / 회피 초기화용
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Goliath Turret"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언 안 없애서 나온 전멸기
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Kakaru"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언 등장 소리
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Independent Command Center"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언이 플레이어 피격 인식
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Wall Flame Trap");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Upper Level Door");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Pit Door");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Kyadarin Crystal Formation");

		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Khaydarin Crystal Formation"); -- 1-1,3,4 패턴 마린 데미지 계산
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Jump Gate"); -- 1-1 패턴 역병 맞고 데미지 면역
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)"); -- 1-2 패턴 폭발 데미지 인식
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret2"); -- 1-4 패턴 마린 움직임 감지 50 데미지
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret1"); -- 디바우러 닿으면 데미지 렉 방지용 카운트
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc"); -- 1-5 패턴 색깔 랜덤 데스값
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Dark Templar (Hero)"); -- 1-5 패턴 대미지 계산
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Dark Swarm"); -- 스카웃 대미지
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Cantina"); -- 일반 패턴 대미지
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Bengalaas"); -- 플레이어 리콜 소리
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 재시작 유닛 무적, 스킬 설정, 기타 처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetResources(Force1, SetTo, 0, OreAndGas);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Men", Force1, "Location 224", 100); -- 유닛 피 100퍼
		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 가디언", AllPlayers, "Location 224"); -- 유닛 무적 설정
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "바이러스 가디언", P9, "Location 224");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 224");
		
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 224", P6); -- 셔틀 제거
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 221", P6);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 224", P6); -- 디파 제거
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", Force1, "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Dark Swarm", "Anywhere", P12); -- 다크 스윔 제거
		
		KillUnit("역병", AllPlayers); -- 가디언 파괴
		KillUnit("역병", P9);
		KillUnit("역병", P10);
		KillUnit("역병", P11);
		KillUnit("역병", P12);
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 224", P7); -- 플라잉 좀비 파괴
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Anywhere", AllPlayers); -- 반피 이하 패턴 스카웃 제거
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Anywhere", P9);
		
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7); -- 비콘 12피한테 주기
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언", P9, "Location 224", P7); -- 마컨 오류 방지
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언", Force1, "Location 224", P7);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7); -- 이펙트용 저글링 주기
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P8, "Location 241", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P10, "Location 241", P9);
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P12, "Location 241", P11);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", P8, "Location 241", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", P9, "Location 241", P7);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 에그", P8, "Location 241", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 에그", P10, "Location 241", P9);
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 에그", P12, "Location 241", P11);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Lurker Egg", P8, "Location 241", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Lurker Egg", P9, "Location 241", P7);
		
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7); -- 이펙트 제거
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1043, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1042, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "시민", "Location 42");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "시민", "Location 42");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "시민", "Location 42", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "시민", P6, "Location 42");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 화면 고정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1078, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1042, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CenterView("Location 42");
	}
}


Trigger { -- 미션5 화면 고정일 때 아칸 제거하고 다시 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1048, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1079, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 42");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P6, "Location 42", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1079, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 42");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P12, "Location 42", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1080, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=============================\r\n\x13\x03시민을 미션 5 비콘에 넣어주세요\r\n\x13\x07=============================\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1082, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 1081, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1081, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Location 32-5");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "미션 5부터", "Location 32-5");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "시민", "Location 32-5", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 마린 재생성
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 1084, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Command(Force1, Exactly, 0, "시민");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Terran Valkyrie");
	}
}

		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1126, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

	}

Trigger { -- 미션5 재시작 브금

Trigger { -- 한순간만 적용해서 설정하는 용도 (ex 6피 색깔)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 1199, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PColor(5, 84); -- 6피 색깔 흰색
		
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Location 224");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "Men", Force1, "Location 224", 100);
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)"); -- 공유 목숨 재설정 하는 트리거 작동용
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker Egg"); -- 보스 피 49,999이하일 때 카운트 데스값
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "Zerg Overmind"); -- 플레이어 스킬 초기화
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 600, "Easy Mode");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 500, "Zerg Lurker Egg");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Lurker");
		
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 237, "Zerg Larva"); -- 분신 나누기
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 475, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 713, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 951, "Zerg Larva");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 1189, "Zerg Larva");
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 99", Set); -- 폭발 이펙트 원래대로 되돌리기
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 스킬 보정
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Score(CurrentPlayer, Custom, AtMost, 549);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, Custom);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 클로킹 유닛 전용 아비터+고정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "Location 198");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("Men", AllPlayers, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		Order("Men", P9, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		Order("Men", P10, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		Order("Men", P11, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		Order("Men", P12, "Location 198", Move, "Location 198");
		
	}
}

mi5bosslive1 = {P7, P9, Force1};

for i=1,3 do -- 미션5 보스 생존 인식 (패턴 사용하는 기준)
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(mi5bosslive1[1], AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 36", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 36", Set);
	}
}
end

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 36", Clear);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 패턴 1-1~5 관리 / 보스 패턴 쿨타임
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 198, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 보스 패턴 쿨타임
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 패턴 1-1~5 관리 / 쿨타임 시간 조정

		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc");
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1180, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");

		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2006, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "Data Disc");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 7000, "Map Revealer");
	}
}

mi5bosspmi = {}; 

table.insert(mi5bosspmi, {1000, 2000, 3000, 4000, 5000, 6000});
table.insert(mi5bosspmi, {1034, 2034, 3034, 4034, 5034, 6034});

for i=1,5 do -- 미션5 보스 패턴 마컨으로 끊기
for m=1,6 do
Trigger { -- 스위치
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, mi5bosspmi[2][m], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, mi5bosspmi[1][m], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(i-1, AtMost, 99, "Ion Cannon");
		Deaths(i-1, AtLeast, 2, "Ion Cannon");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 45", Clear); -- 랜덤 자원 조절용
		SetSwitch("Switch 46", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 47", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 48", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 49", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 50", Clear); -- 1-3 패턴 미네랄&가스 바꾸는 거 1회만 하도록 인식
		SetSwitch("Switch 51", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 52", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 53", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 54", Clear);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 55", Clear); -- 1-3 패턴 시간 더 주는 용도(1)
		SetSwitch("Switch 59", Clear); -- 1-3 패턴 시간 더 주는 용도(2)
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 60", Clear); -- 치료기계 인식으로 6피 색깔 흰색으로 해주기
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 96", Clear); -- 1-5 패턴 시간 더 주는 용도
		SetSwitch("Switch 97", Clear);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 데스값 및 각종 처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, mi5bosspmi[2][m], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, mi5bosspmi[1][m], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(i-1, AtMost, 99, "Ion Cannon");
		Deaths(i-1, AtLeast, 2, "Ion Cannon");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 7000, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 보스 패턴 끊기
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Disruption Field"); -- 셔틀색 초기화
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc"); -- 패턴 사용 중일 때 가디언은 공격 중지
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Dark Swarm"); -- 1-1 패턴에서 가디언 빨리 안 없애면 전멸기
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Cocoon");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Cantina");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Bengalaas");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Arcturus Mengsk (Battlecruiser)");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Alan Turret"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언 안 없애서 나온 즉사 패턴 카운트
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Extractor"); -- 패턴 랜덤
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Evolution Chamber"); -- 셔틀이 따라가는 플레이어 정하기
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth"); -- 셔틀 아래 할루 이펙트
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Warp Gate"); -- 셔틀 빨리 사라지게 하기
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Map Revealer"); -- 패턴 알림 메시지
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Kakaru"); -- 역병 패턴 소리 (가디언 나오는 거)
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Goliath Turret"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언 안 없애서 나온 전멸기
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Independent Command Center"); -- 1-1 패턴 가디언이 플레이어 피격 인식
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Wall Flame Trap");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Upper Level Door");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Left Pit Door");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Kyadarin Crystal Formation");

		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Khaydarin Crystal Formation"); -- 1-1,3,4 패턴 마린 데미지 계산
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Jump Gate"); -- 1-1 패턴 역병 맞고 데미지 면역
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)"); -- 1-2 패턴 폭발 데미지 인식
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Gantrithor (Carrier)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Floor Hatch (UNUSED)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Edmund Duke (Siege Tank)");
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Duke Turret2"); -- 1-4 패턴 마린 움직임 감지 50 데미지
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc"); -- 1-5 패턴 색깔 랜덤 데스값
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Dark Templar (Hero)"); -- 1-5 패턴 대미지 계산
		
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 224", P6); -- 셔틀 제거
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Location 221", P6);
		
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7); -- 이펙트 제거
		
		KillUnit("역병", AllPlayers); -- 가디언 파괴
		KillUnit("역병", P9);
		KillUnit("역병", P10);
		KillUnit("역병", P11);
		KillUnit("역병", P12);
		
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7); -- 비콘 12피한테 주기
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7); -- 이펙트용 저글링 주기
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}
end
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 7998, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 7000, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
	}
}

table.insert(mi5pcancel, {"\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=============================================\r\n\x13\x10보라 플레이어\x04가 마인드 컨트롤로 패턴을 끊었습니다\r\n\x13\x07=============================================\r\n\r\n\r\n"});
table.insert(mi5pcancel, {"\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=============================================\r\n\x13\x11주황 플레이어\x04가 마인드 컨트롤로 패턴을 끊었습니다\r\n\x13\x07=============================================\r\n\r\n\r\n"});

for i=1,5 do --
Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 7001, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(i-1, AtMost, 99, "Ion Cannon");
		Deaths(i-1, AtLeast, 2, "Ion Cannon");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\PPwrDown.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\PPwrDown.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\PPwrDown.wav");
		DisplayText(mi5pcancel[i][1], 0);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 마컨 후 플레이어 & 6피 색 원래대로
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 7999, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 7003, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Evolution Chamber"); -- 대상 플레이어 지정 용도
		
		PColor(5, 84); -- 6피 다시 흰색
		
		PColor(0, 111); -- 플레이어 색 원래대로
		PColor(1, 165);
		PColor(2, 159);
		PColor(3, 164);
		PColor(4, 156);
	}
}

mi5becon= {};

table.insert(mi5becon, {2999,4999,6999});
table.insert(mi5becon, {1000,3000,5000});
table.insert(mi5becon, {"미네랄 비콘","가스 비콘"});

table.insert(mi5becon, {P6,P12,P6});
table.insert(mi5becon, {P7,P6,P7});
table.insert(mi5becon, {P12,P6,P12});

table.insert(mi5becon, {P12,P6,P12}); -- 6피 색깔

for i=1,3 do -- 자원 패턴일 때만 비콘 6피한테 주기
for m=1,2 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, mi5becon[1][i], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, mi5becon[2][i], "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(mi5becon[4][i], AtLeast, 1, mi5becon[3][m], "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
        GiveUnits(1, mi5becon[3][m], mi5becon[4][i], "Location 224", mi5becon[5][i]);
		GiveUnits(1, mi5becon[3][m], mi5becon[5][i], "Location 224", mi5becon[6][i]);
	}
}
end
end

mi5bossp = {}; 

table.insert(mi5bossp, {1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512});
table.insert(mi5bossp, {204,409,  512,614,  819,1023});
table.insert(mi5bossp, {0,205,    410,513,  615,820}); -- 랜덤 패턴 결정

table.insert(mi5bossp, {40,81,122,163,204});
table.insert(mi5bossp, {0,41,82,123,164}); -- 1-1 패턴에서 대상 플레이어 결정

for i=1,10 do -- 랜덤 패턴 (조건1~1024) / 테스트 아닐 때만 작동 / 임시체크
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 37", Random);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 37", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, mi5bossp[1][i], "Zerg Extractor");
	}
}
end

mi5dtest = {}; 

table.insert(mi5dtest, {"Z", "X", "C", "V", "B", "N"}); -- 위에 있는 mi5bossp 참고(똑같아야 됨)
table.insert(mi5dtest, {204,409,  512,614,  819,1023});

mi5ore = {}; 

table.insert(mi5ore, {Set, Cleared}); -- 랜덤 자원용
table.insert(mi5ore, {Ore, Gas}); 
table.insert(mi5ore, {Gas, Ore}); 


for i=1,6 do -- 미션5 패턴이랑 패턴 대상 플레이어 임의 조정 (테스트용)

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Evolution Chamber");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		키인식(mi5dtest[1][i], Exactly);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, mi5dtest[2][i], "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 170, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
	}
}
end

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 179, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 178, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", "Location 224");
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 256, "Zerg Extractor");
	}
}

	},

		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {

		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, "Zerg Cerebrate");
	}
}

	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 12, "Zerg Cerebrate");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},

		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate");

		Order("Men", P1, "Location 224", Move, "Location 225");
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P2, "Location 224", "Location 225");
		Order("Men", P2, "Location 224", Move, "Location 225");

		Order("Men", P3, "Location 224", Move, "Location 225");	
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P4, "Location 224", "Location 225");
		Order("Men", P4, "Location 224", Move, "Location 225");
		
		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 소총병", P5, "Location 224", "Location 225");
		MoveUnit(1, "Hyperion (Battlecruiser)", P5, "Location 224", "Location 225");
		MoveUnit(1, "Magellan (Science Vessel)", P5, "Location 224", "Location 225");
	}
}

for i=1,3 do -- 17 테스트 / 3피 닥템 영웅 아칸으로 자동 이동(마컨용)(1) / 임시체크
Trigger { --
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 2034, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 2000, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, i-1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		Deaths(P3, AtMost, 0, "Easy Mode");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", "Location 224");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 36, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, i, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P1, "Location 224", "Location 230");
		Order("Men", P1, "Location 224", Move, "Location 230");
		
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P2, "Location 224", "Location 222");
		Order("Men", P2, "Location 224", Move, "Location 222");
		
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P3, "Location 224", "Location 231");
		Order("Men", P3, "Location 224", Move, "Location 231");
		
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P4, "Location 224", "Location 226");
		Order("Men", P4, "Location 224", Move, "Location 226");
		
		MoveUnit(1, "Dark Templar (Hero)", P5, "Location 224", "Location 225");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 17 테스트 / 3피 뮤탈 아칸으로 자동 이동(마컨용)(2)
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 2034, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 2000, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 3, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		Deaths(P4, AtMost, 0, "Easy Mode");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Mutalisk", "Location 224");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 36, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");

		Order("Men", P1, "Location 224", Move, "Location 230");
		
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P2, "Location 224", "Location 222");
		Order("Men", P2, "Location 224", Move, "Location 222");
		
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P3, "Location 224", "Location 231");
		Order("Men", P3, "Location 224", Move, "Location 231");

	}
