for i=1,8 do -- 미션5 보스 패턴 2-2 / 로케 이동, 뮤탈 생성(1)
for m=1,6 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 10212+(i*6)-6, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7); -- 4
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7); -- 8 (1차 뮤탈)
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7); -- 4
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7); -- 7 (2차 뮤탈)
		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 224");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 224", Patrol, "Location 224");
	}
}
end
end

for i=1,8 do -- 미션5 보스 패턴 2-2 / 로케 이동, 뮤탈 생성(2)
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 10212+(i*6)-6, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7); -- 4
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 223", P11);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 223", P7); -- 8 (1차 뮤탈)

		SetInvincibility(Enable, "플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 224");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P7, "Location 224", Patrol, "Location 224");
	}
}
end

for i=1,8 do -- 미션5 보스 패턴 2-2 / 뮤탈 공격 후 파괴
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 10212+(i*6)-3, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 시간 되면 디파 삭제
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 19999, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 10260, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { --  미션5 보스 패턴 2-2 / 끝나고 원상복귀
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 10999, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 10263, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 11000, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	}
}

Trigger { --  
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 19999, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 11012, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "Data Disc"); -- 패턴 사용 중일 때 아칸은 공격 중지
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den"); -- 랜덤 패턴 결정값+패턴 쿨타임
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 207, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)"); -- 마컨 소비용 패턴&2-1 뮤탈 패턴
		
		KillUnit("Dark Swarm", P12);
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 224", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", Force1);
		KillUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", P6);
		KillUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", P12);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

for i=0,120 do -- 몰려오는 스카웃 숫자 계산
Trigger { --  
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, i, "Disruption Field", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, i, "Terran Supply Depot");
	}
}
end

Trigger { --  아칸한테 136 로케 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 136");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 136", "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224");
	}
}

Trigger { --  임시 테스트 2-1~2 패턴 봉인 / 임시폐기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 500, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
	}
}

mi5bosshph = {}; 

table.insert(mi5bosshph, {"Vulture Spider Mine", "Vulture Spider Mine", "Vulture Spider Mine", "Zerg Hydralisk"}); -- 
table.insert(mi5bosshph, {P7, P9, P11, P7}); -- 

table.insert(mi5bosshph, {1104,1102}); -- 
table.insert(mi5bosshph, {AtLeast,AtMost}); -- 
table.insert(mi5bosshph, {31,30}); -- 5

for i=1,4 do --  미션 5 스카웃 소환용 마인, 히드라 배치
for m=1,3 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, i-1, "Normal Mode");
		Bring(7+i, AtLeast, 1, "Cocoon", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Cocoon", 7+i, "Location 241");
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "Cocoon", "Location 242", 7+i);
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, mi5bosshph[1][i], "Location 242", P7, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
	    GiveUnits(1, mi5bosshph[1][i], P7, "Location 242", mi5bosshph[2][i]);
	}
}
end
end

for i=1,4 do --
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, i-1, "Normal Mode");
		Bring(7+i, Exactly, 0, "Cocoon", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, i, "Normal Mode");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 스카웃 배치후 7피 코쿤 삭제
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Cocoon", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Cocoon", "Location 241", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Cocoon", "Location 241", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 스카웃 이동(1-1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1102, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 39, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 39, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 39, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 39, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Vulture Spider Mine", P7, "Location 241"); -- 1
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P7, "Location 242", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225"); 
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Vulture Spider Mine", P9, "Location 241"); -- 2
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P9, "Location 242", P10);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225"); 
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Vulture Spider Mine", P11, "Location 241"); -- 3
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P11, "Location 242", P12);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225"); 
		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 스카웃 이동(1-2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1102, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 39, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");		
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241", P8);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 242", P9);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225");
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", P8, "Location 241", P7);		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241");
	}
}

for i=1,2 do -- 스카웃 이동(2-1)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, mi5bosshph[3][i], "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		Bring(P7, mi5bosshph[4][i], mi5bosshph[5][i], "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P9, mi5bosshph[4][i], mi5bosshph[5][i], "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P11, mi5bosshph[4][i], mi5bosshph[5][i], "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P7, mi5bosshph[4][i], mi5bosshph[5][i], "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");
		
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 1, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Vulture Spider Mine", P7, "Location 241"); -- 1
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P7, "Location 242", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225"); 
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Vulture Spider Mine", P9, "Location 241"); -- 2
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P9, "Location 242", P10);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225"); 
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Vulture Spider Mine", P11, "Location 241"); -- 3
		GiveUnits(1, "Vulture Spider Mine", P11, "Location 242", P12);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225"); 
		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241");
	}
}
end

for i=2,50 do -- 스카웃 이동(2-2)
for m=1,2 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, mi5bosshph[3][m], "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		Bring(P7, mi5bosshph[4][m], mi5bosshph[5][m], "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");
		
		Bring(P7, Exactly, i, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");		
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		GiveUnits(i-1, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241", P8);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 242", P9);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225");
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", P8, "Location 241", P7);		
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241");
	}
}
end
end

Trigger { -- 스카웃 이동(3-1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1102, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");	
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 242", "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 242", P9);
		CreateUnit(1, "Disruption Field", "Location 242", P7);
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225");
			
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 스카웃 이동용 유닛 다시 원래 주인에게 주기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 4, "Normal Mode");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1999, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 0, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P9, AtMost, 0, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P11, AtMost, 0, "Vulture Spider Mine", "Location 241");
		Bring(P7, AtMost, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P8, "Location 241", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P10, "Location 241", P9);
		GiveUnits(All, "Vulture Spider Mine", P12, "Location 241", P11);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Hydralisk", P9, "Location 241", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { --  미션5 보스 반피 이하되면 나오는 패턴 / 데스값 1,000은 TE에서 보스 체력 인식해서 1,000으로 만들어줌
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1998, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1000, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)"); -- 보스 피 절반 이하 되면 자동으로 1000설정 됨
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
	}
}

Trigger { --  17 테스트 / 스카웃 없애기 / 임시폐기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location 224");
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { --  안내 메시지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1001, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Boss Pattern.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Boss Pattern.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Boss Pattern.ogg");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==============================\r\n\x13\x07바이러스가 몰려옵니다\r\n\x13\x1F닿을 때마다 20의 피해를 입습니다\r\n\x13\x07==============================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { --  스카웃 최초 시작 전 마인 일부 주기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1099, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1012, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Vulture Spider Mine", P7, "Location 241", P8);
		GiveUnits(15, "Vulture Spider Mine", P9, "Location 241", P10);
		GiveUnits(15, "Vulture Spider Mine", P11, "Location 241", P12);
		
		GiveUnits(24, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241", P8);
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Hydralisk", P7, "Location 241", P9);
		GiveUnits(24, "Zerg Hydralisk", P8, "Location 241", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 아칸한테 간 스카웃 파괴(1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location 134");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 134", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 134", P9);
	}
}

		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 134", P9);
	}

Trigger { -- 스카웃 계속 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1199, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location 241");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241");
		Order("Disruption Field", P7, "Location 241", Move, "Location 225");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 스카웃 8피 오류 방지
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1199, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(All, "Disruption Field", P8, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

for i=1,5 do -- 스카웃에 닿으면 데미지 / 데미지 계산
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1199, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Duke Turret1");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location "..65+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 50, "Dark Swarm");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Duke Turret1");
		
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 213, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..65+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Scout\\PScDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Scout\\PScDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Scout\\PScDth00.wav");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1199, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Duke Turret1");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location "..65+i);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Duke Turret1");
		
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 213, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location "..65+i, P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Scout\\PScDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Scout\\PScDth00.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Scout\\PScDth00.wav");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 렉 방지용 카운트 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1199, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Duke Turret1");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "Duke Turret1");
	}
}

		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

	},

Trigger { -- 패턴에서 스카웃 잠시 없애야 할 때 (1-1 패턴 225 범위 디바 파괴)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1199, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1035, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 225", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Location 225", P9);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1100, "Vespene Tank (Terran Type 2)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1000*(i+2)+1, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1000*(i+2), "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Anywhere");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnit("Disruption Field", P7);
		KillUnit("Disruption Field", P9);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {

		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1000*(i+2), "Zerg Hydralisk Den");

for i=1,7 do -- 스카웃으로 분신 인식해서 없애기
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 9, "Disruption Field", "Location 224");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "분신", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0); -- 15
		
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0);
		MoveLocation("Location 232", "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Disruption Field", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 232", 0); -- 20
	}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "Disruption Field", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Disruption Field", P9, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

mi5normal = {}; 

table.insert(mi5normal, {255, 511, 767, 1023});
table.insert(mi5normal, {0, 256, 512, 768});

table.insert(mi5normal, {"7", "8", "9", "0"});

for i=1,4 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 테스트 / 임시폐기
Trigger { --
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1096, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");	
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 39, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 999, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
		
		키인식(mi5normal[3][i], Exactly);
		
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, mi5normal[1][i], "Zerg Extractor");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션5 일반 공격 테스트 전용 1-1~5 패턴 데스값 조정 / 테스트 / 임시폐기
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 90, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Uraj Crystal");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 5피 마린한테 마린 이동 / 테스트 / 임시폐기
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Set);
		키인식("M", Exactly);
		
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P1, "Location 224", "Location 5");
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P2, "Location 224", "Location 5");
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P3, "Location 224", "Location 5");
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P4, "Location 224", "Location 5");
	}
}

for i=1,4 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 4개 랜덤 패턴 / 임시체크
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 1096, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");	
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 36, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, mi5normal[1][i], "Zerg Extractor");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, mi5normal[2][i], "Zerg Extractor");
		
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 999, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1000*i, "Uraj Crystal");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1000, "Bengalaas"); -- 플레이어 리콜 소리
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 리콜 소리 (공통)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1000, "Bengalaas");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();		
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Bengalaas");	
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\recallup.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\recallup.ogg");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\recallup.ogg");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-1
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1001, "Uraj Crystal");
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 4번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 8번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 11번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 14번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-2
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 2000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2001, "Uraj Crystal");
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 7번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 10번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 11번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 12번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-3 (1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2~5
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발6,7
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 8,9
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발10
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 11,12
		
		GiveUnits(3, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발13~15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-3 (2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 10번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 10번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 10번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10

		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3

		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-3 (3)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 3001, "Uraj Crystal");
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-4 (1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발8,9
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발12
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13,14
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7

		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11

	}

Trigger { -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 저글링 주기 1-4 (2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4000, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 4001, "Uraj Crystal");	
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발8,9
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발12
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13,14
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발8,9
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발12
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13,14
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
	}
}

for i=1,7 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 리콜 이펙트 1-1
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1001, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	}
}
end

for i=1,6 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 리콜 이펙트 1-2

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

	actions = {

		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);

		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);

		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);

		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);

		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);

		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");

		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);

for i=1,7 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 리콜 이펙트 1-3
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3001, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 13
	}
}
end

for i=1,9 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 리콜 이펙트 1-4 (1)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4001, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	}
}
end

Trigger {    -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 리콜 이펙트 1-4 (2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4001, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 391, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 4
	}
}

for i=1,4 do  -- 저글링 다시 7피로 (공통) + 카운트
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, (1000*i)+1, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
        SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, (1000*i)+10, "Uraj Crystal");
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, (1000*i)+33, "Uraj Crystal");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, (1000*i)+10, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
        SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, "Uraj Crystal");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 저그 유닛 죽는 이펙트 초록색으로 바꾸기 TE
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, (1000*i)+33, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 98", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 98", Set);
		
		SetDeaths(Force1, Add, 3, "Zerg Lurker");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 소리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, (1000*i)+34, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 100", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 101", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 102", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 103", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 104", Set);
	}
}
end

for i=1,5 do -- 플레이어 피격 이펙트 소리
Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch "..99+i, Set);
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();		
		SetSwitch("Switch "..99+i, Clear);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Devourer\\ZDvDth00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Devourer\\ZDvDth00.WAV");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Devourer\\ZDvDth00.WAV");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-1
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 4번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 8번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 11번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 14번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
	}
}

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-2

		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 7번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9번째 줄
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 10번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
		
		GiveUnits(19, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 11번째 줄

		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --

		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); --
	}

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-3 (1)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 4번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 5번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2~5
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발6,7
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 8,9
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발10
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 11,12
		
		GiveUnits(3, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 6번째 줄 폭발13~15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 7번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발4
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발7,8
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 9,10
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발11
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 8번째 줄 폭발14,15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
	}
}

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-3 (2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 9번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3

		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 5,6

		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 12,13

		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 10번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-3 (3)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발1
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 2,3
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발4

Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-4 (1)

		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(38, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 맨 왼쪽 2줄
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발8,9
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발12
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13,14
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 3번째 줄 폭발15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
