Trigger { -- 피격 이펙트 전에 다시 저글링 주기 1-4 (2)
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발8,9
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발12
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13,14
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 13번째 줄 폭발15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(15, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 14번째 줄 폭발
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
		
		
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발1,2
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 3,4
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발5
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 6,7
		
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발8,9
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 10,11
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발12
		GiveUnits(2, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 13,14
		
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9); -- 15번째 줄 폭발15
		GiveUnits(4, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8); -- 마지막 4개
	}
}

for i=1,7 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 대미지 이펙트+처리 1-1
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

for i=1,6 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 대미지 이펙트+처리 1-2
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 2034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {

		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 152", 0);
	}

		Deaths(P5, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");

		Bring(P5, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 152");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 100, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 152", 0);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");		
		Deaths(P1, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 238");

	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 100, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}

		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 152", 0);
	}
}

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");

		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 152");

		PreserveTrigger();

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

	conditions = {

		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Bring(P1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 238");

		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 100, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);

for i=1,7 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 대미지 이펙트+처리 1-4 (4)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 152", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");	
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 152", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {

		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");

	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");		
		Deaths(P3, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P3, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 238");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 100, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 152", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");	
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 152", 0);
	}
}

	conditions = {

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 238", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");

		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);

		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 5
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 10
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7); -- 15
	
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 1
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");		
		Deaths(P1, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(P1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 238");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 100, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 238", 0);
	}
}

for i=1,7 do -- 미션5 보스 일반 공격이랑 같이 나오는 패턴 / 대미지 이펙트+처리 1-4 (7)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 4034, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		
		MoveLocation("Location 152", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");	
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 223", P10);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 58, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 223", P7);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "분신", Force1, "Location 152", 0);
	}
}

for i=1,4 do -- 끝나고 뒤처리 (공통)
Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, (1000*i)+34, "Uraj Crystal");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
		
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 10000, "Uraj Crystal");
		SetSwitch("Switch 98", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 99", Set); -- TE에 쓰임. 데미지 이펙트 녹색으로 만들기용.
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 플레이어 대미지 처리 약간만 늦게
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 198, "Cantina");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Cantina");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Cantina");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 102, "Cantina");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 200, "Cantina");
	}
}

	conditions = {

		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Cantina");
	}

Trigger { -- 패턴 랜덤 초기화 (테스트 아닐 때만 작동) / 임시체크
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 5, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Switch("Switch 36", Set);
		Switch("Switch 17", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Extractor"); -- 랜덤 패턴
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 TE 보충으로 보스 죽이기 / 피 49,999이하 되면 스위치 67 켜짐, 저그 라바 6으로 설정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 998, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, Add, 1, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "Protoss Archon", "Location 198", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Protoss Archon", P7, "Location 198");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "Protoss Archon", P7, "Location 198", 1);
		SetMemoryX(0x666458, SetTo, 214, 0xFFFF);
		CreateUnit(1, "Scanner Sweep", "Location 225", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 플레이어 아칸 사망 사운드
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\Explo4.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\Explo4.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\Explo4.wav");
	}
}


Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 2, "Ursadon (Ice World)");

		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224", "Location 191");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언", Force1, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "바이러스 가디언", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		MoveUnit(1, "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Location 224", "Location 191");
		MoveUnit(1, "Protoss Archon", P7, "Location 198", "Location 225");
		KillUnitAt(All, "Protoss Archon", "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 플레이어&6피 색 원래대로 되돌리기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
	},
	actions = {
		PColor(5, 84); -- 6피 다시 흰색
		
		PColor(0, 111); -- 플레이어 색 원래대로
		PColor(1, 165);
		PColor(2, 159);
		PColor(3, 164);
		PColor(4, 156);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 가디언 계속 죽이기
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 191");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 191", P7);
	}
}

for i=1,5 do -- 미션 5 보스 사망
Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 1999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 505, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 3, "Ursadon (Ice World)");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 224");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}
end

Trigger { -- 미션 5 보스 사망 후 인식 카운트 / 각종 유닛 처리
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2098, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		
		SetResources(Force1, SetTo, 0, OreAndGas);
		
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "치료기계", "Anywhere", P6); -- 셔틀 제거
		
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", P12, "Location 224", P6); -- 디파 제거
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", Force1, "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "바이러스 가디언의 파편", "Location 224", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Dark Swarm", "Anywhere", P12); -- 다크 스윔 제거
		
		KillUnit("역병", AllPlayers); -- 가디언 파괴
		KillUnit("역병", P9);
		KillUnit("역병", P10);
		KillUnit("역병", P11);
		KillUnit("역병", P12);
		
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비", "Location 224", P7); -- 플라잉 좀비 파괴
		
		RemoveUnit("Scanner Sweep", P7); -- 이펙트 제거
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 스카웃 파괴
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2006, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2000, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Anywhere", P7);
		KillUnitAt(All, "Disruption Field", "Anywhere", P9);
		RemoveUnit("시민", P7);
		RemoveUnit("시민", P8);
		RemoveUnit("시민", P9);
		RemoveUnit("시민", P10);
		RemoveUnit("시민", P11);
		RemoveUnit("시민", P12);
	}
}

Trigger { --
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2999, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2007, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("Disruption Field", P7);
		RemoveUnit("Disruption Field", P9);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 마린 생성+비콘 삭제
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 2030, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 224", Force1);
		CreateUnit(5, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 73", P6);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 224");
		
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7); -- 비콘 12피한테 주기
		GiveUnits(1, "가스 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P6, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(1, "미네랄 비콘", P7, "Location 224", P12);
		
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "가스 비콘", "Location 224", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미네랄 비콘", "Location 224", P12);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "가스 비콘", "Location 224", AllPlayers);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "미네랄 비콘", "Location 224", AllPlayers);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 마린 고정
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2099, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2030, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 224", "Location 73");
	}
}

	}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 위쪽 시야 차단
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2099, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2054, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "카메라", P6, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P6, "Location 223", P12); -- 왼쪽 아래꺼 12
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "카메라", P6, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P6, "Location 223", P11); -- 왼쪽 위에꺼 11
		
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "카메라", P6, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P6, "Location 223", P12); -- 오른쪽 아래꺼 12
		MoveLocation("Location 223", "카메라", P6, "Location 224");
		GiveUnits(1, "카메라", P6, "Location 223", P11); -- 오른쪽 위에꺼 11
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 플레이어한테 적용할 시야
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2199, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2054, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 2, "카메라", "Location 224");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 2, "카메라", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P12, "Location 224", CurrentPlayer);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2199, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2054, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P11, AtLeast, 2, "카메라", "Location 224");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "카메라", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 1");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 2");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 3");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 4");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 5");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 마린 이동할 곳으로 로케 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2099, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2054, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P10, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P11, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P12, "Location 224", P7);
		
		GiveUnits(152, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8);
		GiveUnits(13, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P8);
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Zergling", P7, "Location 224", P9);
		
		MoveLocation("Location 90", "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224");
		
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P8, "Location 224", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Zerg Zergling", P9, "Location 224", P7);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 보스 제거 후 대화
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2054, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x11플레이어 5\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭔 괴물새끼가……총을 얼마나 처맞아야 죽는 거야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F바닥이 무너질 때 총알도 쏟아져서 산거지. 난 3발 남았어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4500);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그보다, 저거 그때 그거 아니야? 탱크 있던 곳에서 나왔던 놈. 그때 확실히 죽였는데…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 5250);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(5250);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그게 하나라는 보장은 없지.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3500);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(3500);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이제까지 본 게 두 번이 다니까 다른 좀비처럼 막 쏟아지는 건 아닐 테고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4500);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0E플레이어 2\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F정말 드물게 나오는 변형체 같은 건가?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3250);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(3250);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아니면 아까 그 사이비 새끼들이랑 관련 있는 거 아니야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x0F플레이어 3\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭔가 하는 거 같긴 했거든.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 3500);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(3500);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아까 상황을 봐선 확실히 관련은 있는 거 같아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그 전구공 같은 괴물이 여기를 완전히 뒤집어 버려서 조사할만한 흔적이 아무것도 안 남은 게 문제지만.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 7500);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(7500);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그건 그거고, 일단 앞으로 더 가보자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4000);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(4000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x10플레이어 4\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F계속 여기 있을 수도 없고, 앞에는 올라가는 길이 있을지도 모르잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 6500);
		MinimapPing("Location 73");
		Wait(6500);
		
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Clear);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 대화 끝나고 6피 비전 임시 끄기
	players = {Force1, P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2199, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		RunAIScript("Turn OFF Shared Vision for Player 6");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 대화 끝나고 마린 위로 이동+삭제
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2199, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P6, "Location 224", Move, "Location 90");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 90", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 마린 다시 삭제 후 카메라 12한테 주기

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2199, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2100, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 224");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2200, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", Force1, "Location 224", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P11, "Location 224", P12);
	}
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2298, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();

	}
}

Trigger { -- 미션 5 클리어 메시지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2300, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("Location 90");
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이정도면 올라갈 수 있을 거 같은데?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 4500);
		MinimapPing("Location 90");
		Wait(4500);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x08플레이어 1\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아래서 좀 받쳐줘 봐. 올려주면 나가서 밧줄 같은 거 해올게.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 소총병", 6000);
		MinimapPing("Location 90");
		Wait(6000);
		
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 5 :: \x04바이러스 가디언 제거 \x1F클리어\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
        PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		PlayWAV("sound\\Misc\\TRescue.wav");
		
		Wait(5000);
		
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2305, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Set);
		Wait(1000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2400, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 아비터에 파벳 생성
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2305, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(1, "김서준 소장", "Location 198", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "실드 무력화 장치", P7, "Location 198");
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P12, "Location 224", P6);
	}
}

Trigger { -- 소장 이동
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2499, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2478, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");

Trigger { -- 소장 이동 후 카운트
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 2598, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2500, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 소장 대화 메시지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2548, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03김서준 소장\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F…….\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 225");
		TalkingPortrait("김서준 소장", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		GiveUnits(All, "카메라", P6, "Location 224", P7);
		Wait(2000);
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 2600, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2600, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CenterView("Location 198");
	}
}

Trigger { -- 승리 메시지
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, Exactly, 6, "Zerg Larva");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 2600, "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x04좀비 플래닛 3에서 이어집니다\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03제작자 : AntMouse\r\n\r\n\x13\x07맵 다운로드 : https://blog.naver.com/antmouse\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(5000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03승리했습니다!!\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(4000);
		Victory();
	}
}
